                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <!-- Container for dynamic competition tabs -->
      <div id="competitionTabsContainer" class="mt-4">
        <!-- Dynamic competition tabs will be inserted here -->
      </div>
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <!-- Container for dynamically generated competition content -->
      <div id="competitionResult" class="mt-4"></div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- JavaScript to Process the Competition Form and Create Dynamic Competition Tabs -->
<script>
  let competitionCounter = 0;
  const competitionTabsContainer = document.getElementById("competitionTabsContainer");

  document.getElementById("competitionForm").addEventListener("submit", function(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    const compName = document.getElementById("compName").value.trim();
    const numGroups = parseInt(document.getElementById("numGroups").value, 10);
    const maxPlayers = parseInt(document.getElementById("maxPlayers").value, 10);
    
    // Basic validation (you can expand on this)
    if (!compName || isNaN(numGroups) || isNaN(maxPlayers)) {
      alert("Please fill all fields correctly.");
      return;
    }
    
    // Close the modal using Bootstrap's modal instance
    const competitionModalEl = document.getElementById('competitionModal');
    const modal = bootstrap.Modal.getInstance(competitionModalEl);
    modal.hide();
    
    // Create a new tab for the competition
    competitionCounter++;
    const competitionId = "competitionTab" + competitionCounter;
    
    // Create the tab header button (for our dynamic competition tabs)
    const tabButton = document.createElement("button");
    tabButton.className = "nav-link";
    tabButton.id = competitionId + "-tab";
    tabButton.setAttribute("data-bs-toggle", "tab");
    tabButton.setAttribute("data-bs-target", "#" + competitionId);
    tabButton.type = "button";
    tabButton.setAttribute("role", "tab");
    tabButton.setAttribute("aria-controls", competitionId);
    tabButton.setAttribute("aria-selected", "false");
    tabButton.innerText = compName;
    
    // Create a container for the tab header if it doesn't exist
    let dynamicTabHeader = document.getElementById("dynamicCompetitionTabs");
    if (!dynamicTabHeader) {
      dynamicTabHeader = document.createElement("ul");
      dynamicTabHeader.className = "nav nav-tabs mt-4";
      dynamicTabHeader.id = "dynamicCompetitionTabs";
      competitionTabsContainer.appendChild(dynamicTabHeader);
    }
    // Append the new tab header
    const tabHeaderItem = document.createElement("li");
    tabHeaderItem.className = "nav-item";
    tabHeaderItem.setAttribute("role", "presentation");
    tabHeaderItem.appendChild(tabButton);
    dynamicTabHeader.appendChild(tabHeaderItem);
    
    // Create the tab content pane
    const tabContentPane = document.createElement("div");
    tabContentPane.className = "tab-pane fade";
    tabContentPane.id = competitionId;
    tabContentPane.setAttribute("role", "tabpanel");
    tabContentPane.setAttribute("aria-labelledby", competitionId + "-tab");
    
    // Build content for each group table
    let groupContent = `<h4>Competition: ${compName}</h4>`;
    const groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ";
    for (let i = 0; i < numGroups; i++) {
      const groupName = `Group ${groupLetters[i] || (i+1)}`;
      groupContent += `
        <div class="mt-3">
          <h5>${groupName}</h5>
          <table class="table table-bordered">
            <thead>
              <tr>
                <th>Player</th>
                <th>Score</th>
              </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
              <!-- Placeholder row -->
              <tr>
                <td colspan="2" class="text-center">No players assigned yet.</td>
              </tr>
            </tbody>
          </table>
        </div>
      `;
    }
    tabContentPane.innerHTML = groupContent;
    
    // Create a container for competition tab content if it doesn't exist
    let dynamicTabContent = document.getElementById("dynamicCompetitionTabsContent");
    if (!dynamicTabContent) {
      dynamicTabContent = document.createElement("div");
      dynamicTabContent.className = "tab-content mt-3";
      dynamicTabContent.id = "dynamicCompetitionTabsContent";
      competitionTabsContainer.appendChild(dynamicTabContent);
    }
    dynamicTabContent.appendChild(tabContentPane);
    
    // Optionally, switch to the new tab immediately using Bootstrap's Tab API
    let newTab = new bootstrap.Tab(tabButton);
    newTab.show();
    
    // Optionally reset the form
    document.getElementById("competitionForm").reset();
  });
</script>
{% endblock %}

Explanation

  1. Dynamic Tabs for Competitions:

    • In the Create Competition tab, after the modal form submission, the JavaScript builds a new tab dynamically.

    • A new header button is created (with a unique ID) that uses the competition name as its label.

    • A corresponding content pane is created that displays the competition name at the top and, using a loop, creates a table for each group (labeled "Group A", "Group B", etc.). Each table is a placeholder for now.

    • The dynamic tabs are appended to a container (#competitionTabsContainer), which itself creates a new <ul> for tab headers and a <div> for tab content if they do not exist.

  2. Form Modal:

    • The "Create Competition" button triggers a Bootstrap modal.

    • The modal form gathers Competition Name, Number of Groups, and Maximum Number of Players.

    • When the form is submitted, the modal is hidden and the new competition tab is created.

  3. Back to Landing Page Button:

    • A "Back to Landing Page" button is fixed in the top right corner.

  4. Sorting and Other Functionality:

    • The Users tab and Players tab remain as before, with the Users tab header now labeled "Username".

    • This code does not persist competition data to the database—it uses JavaScript to manage dynamic content. You can later extend it to save these details on the server if needed.

  5. Bootstrap and JavaScript:

    • This code requires Bootstrap 5 (make sure your base.html loads the correct version).

    • The dynamic tabs use the Bootstrap Tab API to switch to the new competition tab once it’s created.

Copy and paste this entire code into your templates/admin.html file. Then restart your Flask application, log in as admin, go to your admin dashboard, and try creating multiple competitions. Each competition should appear in its own tab labeled with the competition name. Let me know if you need further adjustments!

You said:
OK but now i see if i move away form this page and come back again the all the data is lost and it shouldn't. so adjust the code so the data stays here permanently.
ChatGPT said:
You said:
can you change my code so it reflects my needs
ChatGPT said:

Below is an example implementation that makes competition creation persistent via the database. The solution involves:

  1. Adding a Competition model to your app.

  2. Creating a new route to handle POSTing the competition form (at /create-competition).

  3. Updating your admin dashboard route so that it passes the list of competitions to your template.

  4. Updating your admin.html template so that the "Create Competition" tab shows:

    • Total number of players (from the participants list)

    • A "Create Competition" button that opens a Bootstrap modal with the form

    • A section that loops over all competitions (persisted in your database) and displays for each competition its name along with its groups (tables labeled "Group A," "Group B," etc.)

Follow these steps and then copy/paste the code below into your project files.

1. Update app.py

Add (or update) the following in your app.py. Make sure you import the necessary modules and initialize Flask-Migrate or (for development) simply delete the old database so that db.create_all() creates the correct schema.

python
from flask import Flask, render_template, request, redirect, url_for, flash, session
from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy
from functools import wraps
# Optionally, if you wish to use Flask-Migrate for schema changes:
# from flask_migrate import Migrate

app = Flask(__name__)
app.secret_key = 'your_secret_key_here'  # Change this for production

# Configure SQLAlchemy to use an SQLite database called users.db
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = 'sqlite:///users.db'
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False
db = SQLAlchemy(app)
# Initialize migrations (optional, recommended for production)
# migrate = Migrate(app, db)

# Define the User model (updated with participant column)
class User(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    first_name = db.Column(db.String(80), nullable=False)
    last_name = db.Column(db.String(80), nullable=False)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True, nullable=False)
    password = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    email = db.Column(db.String(120), unique=True, nullable=False)
    phone = db.Column(db.String(20), nullable=False)
    birth_year = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False)
    handedness = db.Column(db.String(10), nullable=False)
    role = db.Column(db.String(20), nullable=False, default='user')
    participant = db.Column(db.Boolean, nullable=False, default=False)

    def __repr__(self):
        return f'<User {self.username}>'

# Define the Competition model to store competition details.
class Competition(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    name = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    num_groups = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False)
    max_players = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False)

    def __repr__(self):
        return f'<Competition {self.name}>'

# Admin-only decorator
def admin_required(f):
    @wraps(f)
    def decorated_function(*args, **kwargs):
        if 'role' not in session or session['role'] != 'admin':
            flash('Access denied: Admins only', 'danger')
            return redirect(url_for('home'))
        return f(*args, **kwargs)
    return decorated_function

# Registration, login, forgot-password, profile, update-profile, etc.
# (Assume these routes are similar to our previous code.)

@app.route('/register', methods=['GET', 'POST'])
def register():
    if request.method == 'POST':
        first_name = request.form['first_name']
        last_name = request.form['last_name']
        email = request.form['email']
        phone = request.form['phone']
        birth_year = request.form['birth_year']
        handedness = request.form['handedness']
        username = request.form['username']
        password = request.form['password']
        if User.query.filter_by(username=username).first():
            flash('Username already exists', 'danger')
        else:
            new_user = User(
                first_name=first_name,
                last_name=last_name,
                email=email,
                phone=phone,
                birth_year=birth_year,
                handedness=handedness,
                username=username,
                password=password
            )
            db.session.add(new_user)
            db.session.commit()
            flash('Registration successful! Please login.', 'success')
            return redirect(url_for('login'))
    return render_template('register.html')

@app.route('/login', methods=['GET', 'POST'])
def login():
    if request.method == 'POST':
        username = request.form['username']
        password = request.form['password']
        user = User.query.filter_by(username=username, password=password).first()
        if user:
            session['username'] = user.username
            session['email'] = user.email
            session['role'] = user.role
            flash('Login successful!', 'success')
            return redirect(url_for('home'))
        else:
            flash('Invalid username or password', 'danger')
    return render_template('login.html')

@app.route('/forgot-password', methods=['GET', 'POST'])
def forgot_password():
    if request.method == 'POST':
        email = request.form['email']
        flash('If an account exists with that email, a password reset link has been sent.', 'info')
        return redirect(url_for('login'))
    return render_template('forgot_password.html')

@app.route('/')
def home():
    if 'username' in session:
        return render_template('landing_page.html')
    return redirect(url_for('login'))

@app.route('/profile')
def profile():
    if 'username' not in session:
        flash('Please login to view your profile', 'warning')
        return redirect(url_for('login'))
    user = User.query.filter_by(username=session['username']).first()
    if user:
        return render_template('profile_page.html', user=user)
    else:
        flash('User not found', 'danger')
        return redirect(url_for('login'))

@app.route('/profile/<username>')
def profile_by_username(username):
    user = User.query.filter_by(username=username).first()
    if user:
        return render_template('profile_page.html', user=user)
    else:
        flash('User not found', 'danger')
        return redirect(url_for('admin_dashboard'))

@app.route('/update-profile', methods=['POST'])
def update_profile():
    if 'username' not in session:
        flash('Please login to update your profile', 'warning')
        return redirect(url_for('login'))
    user = User.query.filter_by(username=session['username']).first()
    if user:
        user.first_name = request.form.get('first_name', user.first_name)
        user.last_name = request.form.get('last_name', user.last_name)
        user.email = request.form.get('email', user.email)
        user.phone = request.form.get('phone', user.phone)
        user.birth_year = request.form.get('birth_year', user.birth_year)
        user.handedness = request.form.get('handedness', user.handedness)
        db.session.commit()
        flash('Profile updated successfully!', 'success')
    else:
        flash('User not found.', 'danger')
    return redirect(url_for('profile'))

# Participant management routes
@app.route('/add-participant/<int:user_id>')
@admin_required
def add_participant(user_id):
    user = User.query.get(user_id)
    if user:
        user.participant = True
        db.session.commit()
        flash(f"{user.first_name} {user.last_name} has been added as a participant.", "success")
    else:
        flash("User not found.", "danger")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard"))

@app.route('/remove-participant/<int:user_id>')
@admin_required
def remove_participant(user_id):
    user = User.query.get(user_id)
    if user:
        if user.participant:
            user.participant = False
            db.session.commit()
            flash(f"{user.first_name} {user.last_name} has been removed from participants.", "success")
        else:
            flash("User is not a participant.", "warning")
    else:
        flash("User not found.", "danger")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard"))

@app.route('/freeze-participant/<int:user_id>')
@admin_required
def freeze_participant(user_id):
    flash("Freeze functionality is not implemented yet.", "info")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard"))

# Competition creation route (persisting competition details)
@app.route('/create-competition', methods=['POST'])
@admin_required
def create_competition():
    comp_name = request.form.get('compName').strip()
    num_groups = int(request.form.get('numGroups'))
    max_players = int(request.form.get('maxPlayers'))
    new_comp = Competition(name=comp_name, num_groups=num_groups, max_players=max_players)
    db.session.add(new_comp)
    db.session.commit()
    flash("Competition created successfully!", "success")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard"))

# Admin dashboard route includes competitions
@app.route('/admin-dashboard')
@admin_required
def admin_dashboard():
    all_users = User.query.order_by(User.username).all()
    participants = User.query.filter_by(participant=True).order_by(User.username).all()
    competitions = Competition.query.order_by(Competition.id).all()
    return render_template('admin.html', users=all_users, participants=participants, competitions=competitions)

@app.route('/logout', methods=['GET', 'POST'])
def logout():
    session.clear()
    flash('You have been logged out', 'info')
    return redirect(url_for('login'))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    with app.app_context():
        db.create_all()
    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5000, debug=True)

2. Update templates/admin.html

Paste this updated admin.html, which now includes the Create Competition tab with persistent competition data.

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link active" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="true">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="false">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="false">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade show active" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <!-- Button to open competition creation modal -->
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      
      <!-- List existing competitions (each competition in its own section) -->
      <div id="competitionList" class="mt-4">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
          <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header">
              <h4>Competition: {{ comp.name }}</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
              {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
              {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
                {% set groupName = "Group " + groupLetters[i] %}
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <h5>{{ groupName }}</h5>
                  <table class="table table-bordered">
                    <thead>
                      <tr>
                        <th>Player</th>
                        <th>Score</th>
                      </tr>
                    </thead>
                    <tbody>
                      <tr>
                        <td colspan="2" class="text-center">No players assigned yet.</td>
                      </tr>
                    </tbody>
                  </table>
                </div>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
          </div>
        {% else %}
          <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>
{% endblock %}

How It Works

  • Persistence:
    The competition form in the Create Competition tab submits to the route /create-competition which creates a Competition record in the database.

  • Displaying Competitions:
    The admin dashboard route queries all competitions from the database and passes them as competitions to the template.

  • Dynamic Rendering:
    In the Create Competition tab, we loop over competitions and for each competition, we display its name (as stored in the Competition table) and create one table per group based on comp.num_groups.

  • Form Persistence:
    The form is a standard POST form that sends the competition details to the server, so once created, they remain in the database and are reloaded every time the admin dashboard is rendered.

Final Steps

  1. Save Your Changes:
    Make sure to update your app.py with the Competition model and /create-competition route as shown earlier.

  2. Restart Your Flask Application:
    Ensure that the new schema is in effect and any changes to your routes are active.

  3. Test:
    Log in as admin and go to your admin dashboard. In the Create Competition tab, check that:

    • It displays the total number of players.

    • The Create Competition button launches the modal form.

    • After submitting the form, the competition is persisted and a new section (with tables for each group) appears in the Create Competition tab.

This implementation should meet your requirements so that competitions are stored permanently and new competition tabs persist across page loads. Let me know if you need further adjustments or have any questions!

You said:
OK but now I see that competitions are being placed one below another instead in each separate tab. Also when submitting competition stay in Create competition tab dont go to Users tab
ChatGPT said:
You said:
give me the code
ChatGPT said:

Below is an updated version of your admin dashboard template that meets your requirements:

  • There are three main outer tabs: Users, Players, and Create Competition.

  • When submitting the competition form, the page redirects back to the dashboard with the Create Competition tab active.

  • In the Create Competition tab, below the form button is a nested tab container where each competition is shown in its own tab (each tab is named by the competition’s name) and displays its groups as separate tables.

Before using this template, ensure that your admin dashboard route in your app.py passes an extra variable called active_tab (defaulting to "users" if not provided) and that your /create-competition route redirects with active_tab="competition". For example:

In app.py (relevant portions):

python
@app.route('/create-competition', methods=['POST'])
@admin_required
def create_competition():
    comp_name = request.form.get('compName').strip()
    num_groups = int(request.form.get('numGroups'))
    max_players = int(request.form.get('maxPlayers'))
    new_comp = Competition(name=comp_name, num_groups=num_groups, max_players=max_players)
    db.session.add(new_comp)
    db.session.commit()
    flash("Competition created successfully!", "success")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard", active_tab="competition"))

@app.route('/admin-dashboard')
@admin_required
def admin_dashboard():
    all_users = User.query.order_by(User.username).all()
    participants = User.query.filter_by(participant=True).order_by(User.username).all()
    competitions = Competition.query.order_by(Competition.id).all()
    # Get active_tab from query parameters (default to 'users')
    active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users')
    return render_template('admin.html', users=all_users, participants=participants, competitions=competitions, active_tab=active_tab)

Now, copy and paste the following complete code into your templates/admin.html file:

templates/admin.html

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Outer Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='competition' %}show active{% endif %}" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <!-- Button to open competition creation modal -->
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <hr>
      <h3>Existing Competitions</h3>
      <!-- Nested tabs for each competition -->
      {% if competitions %}
        <ul class="nav nav-tabs mt-3" id="compNav" role="tablist">
          {% for comp in competitions %}
            <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
              <button class="nav-link {% if loop.first %}active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#comp-{{ comp.id }}" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="comp-{{ comp.id }}" aria-selected="{% if loop.first %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
                {{ comp.name }}
              </button>
            </li>
          {% endfor %}
        </ul>
        <div class="tab-content mt-3" id="compNavContent">
          {% for comp in competitions %}
            <div class="tab-pane fade {% if loop.first %}show active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab">
              {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
              {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
                {% set groupName = "Group " + groupLetters[i] %}
                <div class="mt-3">
                  <h5>{{ groupName }}</h5>
                  <table class="table table-bordered">
                    <thead>
                      <tr>
                        <th>Player</th>
                        <th>Score</th>
                      </tr>
                    </thead>
                    <tbody>
                      <tr>
                        <td colspan="2" class="text-center">No players assigned yet.</td>
                      </tr>
                    </tbody>
                  </table>
                </div>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
      {% else %}
        <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
      {% endif %}

      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>
{% endblock %}

Explanation

  • Outer Tabs:
    The outer tabs use a query parameter (active_tab) to determine which tab should be active (Users, Players, or Competition). Your admin dashboard route should pass active_tab (for instance, after creating a competition, it will pass active_tab=competition).

  • Nested Competitions Tabs:
    In the Create Competition tab, if competitions exist, a nested set of tabs is generated. Each competition gets its own tab header (with the competition name) and its own tab panel. Each tab panel lists the groups defined by the competition’s num_groups (rendering a table for each group).

  • Form and Modal:
    The modal form submits competition data via POST to the /create-competition route. When that route successfully creates a competition, it should redirect back with active_tab=competition (so the Create Competition tab stays active).

  • Persistence:
    The competition records are stored in the Competition model (in the database). When the admin dashboard is reloaded, the competitions list is passed to the template and rendered as dynamic tabs.

Make sure your app.py includes the Competition model and the updated routes as shown above, and that you set the active_tab parameter as needed when redirecting.

Save your changes, restart your Flask application, and test by creating a competition. The new competition should now appear in its own tab under the Create Competition tab, and when you navigate away and return, the competition data should persist.

Let me know if you need further modifications or assistance!

You said:
OK, so I have noticed one issue. Each time I login with different user welcome message always says welcome tomislav markac. It should be welcome and that particular username
ChatGPT said:

To fix that issue, you need to ensure that your welcome message dynamically displays the logged‐in user's username instead of a hard-coded value. In your landing page (or header template), update the welcome message code to use the session variable. For example, if your code currently looks like:

html
<span>Welcome, <strong><a href="/profile">tomislav.markac</a></strong></span>

change it to something like:

html
<span>Welcome, <strong><a href="{{ url_for('profile') }}">{{ session.get('username') }}</a></strong></span>

This change uses session.get('username') so that the welcome message displays the username that was stored during login. Make sure that your login route is saving the username correctly in the session (as in session['username'] = user.username).

After making this change in your template (for example in your landing_page.html or wherever the header is defined), save the file and reload your page. The welcome message should then update according to the currently logged-in user.

Let me know if you need any further assistance!

You said:
Now will go back to my previous query: In the Create Competition tab inform the Admin of the number of the players. Instead of this: Groups functionality is under development. This tab will eventually contain the list of groups for the tournament write Total number of players:variable(count players from Players tab) Below this should be a button Create competition. When clicked a form or pop up with the form should appear with following fields: - Competiton name(text) -Number of Groups(positive integer) -Maximum number of players in one group: (positive integer= and the Submit button that should remember this inputs as they will be used later. This was solved and you provided good solution. Now update the code when admin clicks submit Competitions and tables are created in the Create competition tab. Each group table should have Maximum number of players rows. Each row should have headers Player Name, Year of Birth, Total Matches, Win, Loss, Win% and Actions. Give me entire code so I can copy paste
ChatGPT said:

Below is a complete updated version of your admin.html template that meets your requirements. In this version, within the Create Competition tab:

  • At the top you see the total number of players (taken from the length of the participants list).

  • There’s a button to open a modal form for creating a competition.

  • When a competition is submitted (via your /create-competition route), it is persisted in the database and appears in the list of competitions.

  • For each competition, its details are shown inside a card. For each group defined by the competition (using comp.num_groups), a table is created that contains as many rows as the maximum number of players (using comp.max_players).

  • Each group table has headers: Player Name, Year of Birth, Total Matches, Win, Loss, Win %, and Actions. (Each row is initially a placeholder that you can later fill with actual player assignments.)

Make sure your admin dashboard route in your app.py (for example, in /admin-dashboard) passes the following variables to the template:

  • users: List of all users

  • participants: List of users where participant=True

  • competitions: List of competition records

Also, ensure that when your competition creation form is submitted it posts to your /create-competition route (which should redirect back to the admin dashboard with the Create Competition tab still active).

Copy and paste the following code into your templates/admin.html file:

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='competition' %}show active{% endif %}" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <!-- Button to open competition creation modal -->
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <hr>
      <h3>Existing Competitions</h3>
      <!-- List each competition in a separate card -->
      {% if competitions %}
        {% for comp in competitions %}
          <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header">
              <h4>{{ comp.name }}</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
              {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
              {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
                {% set groupName = "Group " + groupLetters[i] %}
                <div class="mt-3">
                  <h5>{{ groupName }}</h5>
                  <table class="table table-bordered">
                    <thead>
                      <tr>
                        <th>Player Name</th>
                        <th>Year of Birth</th>
                        <th>Total Matches</th>
                        <th>Win</th>
                        <th>Loss</th>
                        <th>Win %</th>
                        <th>Actions</th>
                      </tr>
                    </thead>
                    <tbody>
                      {% for r in range(comp.max_players) %}
                      <tr>
                        <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>
                      </tr>
                      {% endfor %}
                    </tbody>
                  </table>
                </div>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
          </div>
        {% endfor %}
      {% else %}
        <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
      {% endif %}
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>
{% endblock %}

How It Works

  • Admin Dashboard Route:
    Your /admin-dashboard route (in app.py) must query and pass competitions along with users and participants to the template. For example:

    python
    @app.route('/admin-dashboard')
@admin_required
def admin_dashboard():
    all_users = User.query.order_by(User.username).all()
    participants = User.query.filter_by(participant=True).order_by(User.username).all()
    competitions = Competition.query.order_by(Competition.id).all()
    active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users')
    return render_template('admin.html', users=all_users, participants=participants, competitions=competitions, active_tab=active_tab)

  • Persistent Competitions:
    The /create-competition route receives the competition data, creates a new Competition record in the database, and redirects back to the dashboard with active_tab="competition".

  • Dynamic Group Tables:
    In the Create Competition tab, for each competition, the template loops over comp.num_groups and creates a table. For each table, it loops comp.max_players times to generate empty rows with the proper headers.

  • Modal Form:
    The modal form for competition creation submits to your /create-competition route and, once processed, your dashboard shows the new competition(s).

Save your changes, restart your Flask application, and test by creating a competition. The competition should now persist, and you should see each competition's details (including a table for each group with the maximum number of players rows) in separate sections within the Create Competition tab.

Let me know if you need any further assistance!

You said:
We are almost there as it works as expected just again every competition is listed one below another instead of each in a separate tab
ChatGPT said:

Below is a revised complete version of your admin.html template that uses nested tabs for competitions so that each competition appears in its own tab rather than in a list one below another. When you create a new competition, the page is redirected back with the Create Competition tab active and the nested competition tabs are reloaded from the database.

Make sure your app.py admin dashboard route passes the competitions variable and, for example, an active_tab query parameter as shown in our previous examples.

Copy and paste the following code into your templates/admin.html file:

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Outer Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='competition' %}show active{% endif %}" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <!-- Button to open competition creation modal -->
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <hr>
      <!-- If competitions exist, create nested tabs for each competition -->
      {% if competitions %}
      <ul class="nav nav-tabs mt-3" id="compNav" role="tablist">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
          <button class="nav-link {% if loop.first %}active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#comp-{{ comp.id }}" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="comp-{{ comp.id }}" aria-selected="{% if loop.first %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
            {{ comp.name }}
          </button>
        </li>
        {% endfor %}
      </ul>
      <div class="tab-content mt-3" id="compNavContent">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <div class="tab-pane fade {% if loop.first %}show active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab">
          {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
          {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
          {% set groupName = "Group " + groupLetters[i] %}
          <div class="mt-3">
            <h5>{{ groupName }}</h5>
            <table class="table table-bordered">
              <thead>
                <tr>
                  <th>Player Name</th>
                  <th>Year of Birth</th>
                  <th>Total Matches</th>
                  <th>Win</th>
                  <th>Loss</th>
                  <th>Win %</th>
                  <th>Actions</th>
                </tr>
              </thead>
              <tbody>
                {% for r in range(comp.max_players) %}
                <tr>
                  <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>
                </tr>
                {% endfor %}
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      {% else %}
      <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
      {% endif %}
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>
{% endblock %}

How It Works

  • Outer Tabs: Users, Players, and Create Competition.

  • Create Competition Tab:

    • Displays total participants and a button to launch the modal form.

    • Below the form, if competitions exist, it creates a set of nested tabs. Each nested tab header is labeled with the competition name, and each tab pane is populated with group tables.

    • For each competition, the group tables are generated using the competition’s num_groups and max_players settings; each table has the specified number of rows (empty slots).

  • Submission Behavior:
    In your /create-competition route (in your app.py), after creating a competition, make sure you redirect back with active_tab="competition" so that the Create Competition tab remains active.

Example in app.py:

python
@app.route('/create-competition', methods=['POST'])
@admin_required
def create_competition():
    comp_name = request.form.get('compName').strip()
    num_groups = int(request.form.get('numGroups'))
    max_players = int(request.form.get('maxPlayers'))
    new_comp = Competition(name=comp_name, num_groups=num_groups, max_players=max_players)
    db.session.add(new_comp)
    db.session.commit()
    flash("Competition created successfully!", "success")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard", active_tab="competition"))

  • Persistence:
    Competitions are stored in your database via the Competition model. On each load of the admin dashboard, the competitions list is reloaded.

Once you add this template and update your app routes accordingly, each competition will appear as its own nested tab within the Create Competition tab. Let me know if you need any further adjustments or help!

You said:
Now each tab should have above the group title search box with the magnifier icon it written Add players when clicked on it list of all possible Players should appear in a dropdown. There should also be a button Add Player when clicked on it it should add this player to this group with all the relevant info
ChatGPT said:

Below is a complete updated version of your admin.html template that adds a search box above each group table inside each competition’s nested tab. In each group section, you’ll see an input field with a magnifier icon (using Font Awesome) and an “Add Player” button. When clicked, a JavaScript function will look up the entered name in a list of all possible players (which you must pass to the template as the variable all_possible_players), and if a match is found, it will insert a new row into that group’s table populated with that player’s info (currently using placeholders for match statistics). You can later adapt this code to update your database via an AJAX call if needed.

Below are two parts of the code. First, update your app.py so that your admin dashboard route passes an additional variable (all_possible_players) with the full list of users you want to consider for addition. Then, use the updated admin.html template.

1. app.py (Relevant Portions)

Make sure your admin dashboard route looks similar to this. (You must adjust this code to supply all_possible_players as JSON data for client‐side use; here we assume all registered users are possible players.)

python
import json
from flask import Flask, render_template, request, redirect, url_for, flash, session
from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy
from functools import wraps
# (Optional: from flask_migrate import Migrate)

app = Flask(__name__)
app.secret_key = 'your_secret_key_here'
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = 'sqlite:///users.db'
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False
db = SQLAlchemy(app)
# migrate = Migrate(app, db)  # if using migrations

# User model
class User(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    first_name = db.Column(db.String(80), nullable=False)
    last_name = db.Column(db.String(80), nullable=False)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True, nullable=False)
    password = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    email = db.Column(db.String(120), unique=True, nullable=False)
    phone = db.Column(db.String(20), nullable=False)
    birth_year = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False)
    handedness = db.Column(db.String(10), nullable=False)
    role = db.Column(db.String(20), nullable=False, default='user')
    participant = db.Column(db.Boolean, nullable=False, default=False)
    def __repr__(self):
        return f'<User {self.username}>'

# Competition model
class Competition(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    name = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    num_groups = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False)
    max_players = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False)
    def __repr__(self):
        return f'<Competition {self.name}>'

# Admin-only decorator
def admin_required(f):
    @wraps(f)
    def decorated_function(*args, **kwargs):
        if 'role' not in session or session['role'] != 'admin':
            flash('Access denied: Admins only', 'danger')
            return redirect(url_for('home'))
        return f(*args, **kwargs)
    return decorated_function

# (Other routes: register, login, etc.)

@app.route('/admin-dashboard')
@admin_required
def admin_dashboard():
    all_users = User.query.order_by(User.username).all()
    participants = User.query.filter_by(participant=True).order_by(User.username).all()
    competitions = Competition.query.order_by(Competition.id).all()
    active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users')
    # For client-side search, pass all users (or any subset) as JSON.
    all_possible_players = all_users  # adjust as needed
    return render_template('admin.html',
                           users=all_users,
                           participants=participants,
                           competitions=competitions,
                           active_tab=active_tab,
                           all_possible_players=all_possible_players)

@app.route('/create-competition', methods=['POST'])
@admin_required
def create_competition():
    comp_name = request.form.get('compName').strip()
    num_groups = int(request.form.get('numGroups'))
    max_players = int(request.form.get('maxPlayers'))
    new_comp = Competition(name=comp_name, num_groups=num_groups, max_players=max_players)
    db.session.add(new_comp)
    db.session.commit()
    flash("Competition created successfully!", "success")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard", active_tab="competition"))

# Participant routes (add, remove, freeze) – assume they are defined as before

@app.route('/add-participant/<int:user_id>')
@admin_required
def add_participant(user_id):
    user = User.query.get(user_id)
    if user:
        user.participant = True
        db.session.commit()
        flash(f"{user.first_name} {user.last_name} has been added as a participant.", "success")
    else:
        flash("User not found.", "danger")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard"))

@app.route('/remove-participant/<int:user_id>')
@admin_required
def remove_participant(user_id):
    user = User.query.get(user_id)
    if user:
        if user.participant:
            user.participant = False
            db.session.commit()
            flash(f"{user.first_name} {user.last_name} has been removed from participants.", "success")
        else:
            flash("User is not a participant.", "warning")
    else:
        flash("User not found.", "danger")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard"))

@app.route('/freeze-participant/<int:user_id>')
@admin_required
def freeze_participant(user_id):
    flash("Freeze functionality is not implemented yet.", "info")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard"))

# ... (other routes, logout, etc.)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    with app.app_context():
        db.create_all()
    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5000, debug=True)

2. templates/admin.html

Paste the following code into your admin.html file. This version includes nested (dynamic) competition tabs. In each competition tab, each group section now has a search box with a magnifier icon and an "Add Player" button. When the button is clicked, JavaScript will add a new row (if a player is selected) into that group's table with the player's relevant info. (For demonstration purposes, we assume that the list of all possible players is sent as all_possible_players from the route. In the JavaScript code below, we use client‑side filtering.)

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Outer Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
