            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='competition' %}show active{% endif %}" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <!-- Button to open competition creation modal -->
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <hr>
      <!-- Nested tabs for each competition (each competition in its own tab) -->
      {% if competitions %}
      <ul class="nav nav-tabs mt-3" id="compNav" role="tablist">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
          <button class="nav-link {% if loop.first %}active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#comp-{{ comp.id }}" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="comp-{{ comp.id }}" aria-selected="{% if loop.first %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
            {{ comp.name }}
          </button>
        </li>
        {% endfor %}
      </ul>
      <div class="tab-content mt-3" id="compNavContent">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <div class="tab-pane fade {% if loop.first %}show active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab">
          {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
          {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
          {% set groupName = "Group " ~ groupLetters[i] %}
          <div class="group-container mt-4" data-competition-id="{{ comp.id }}" data-group-index="{{ i }}">
            <!-- Search and Add Player Row -->
            <div class="d-flex align-items-center mb-2">
              <h5 class="mb-0 me-2">{{ groupName }}</h5>
              <div class="input-group" style="max-width: 300px;">
                <input type="text" class="form-control player-search" placeholder="Search player...">
                <span class="input-group-text"><i class="fas fa-search"></i></span>
              </div>
              <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary ms-2 add-player-btn">Add Player</button>
            </div>
            <table class="table table-bordered group-table">
              <thead>
                <tr>
                  <th>Player Name</th>
                  <th>Year of Birth</th>
                  <th>Total Matches</th>
                  <th>Win</th>
                  <th>Loss</th>
                  <th>Win %</th>
                  <th>Actions</th>
                </tr>
              </thead>
              <tbody>
                {% for r in range(comp.max_players) %}
                <tr class="group-slot">
                  <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>
                </tr>
                {% endfor %}
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      {% else %}
      <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
      {% endif %}
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Inline JavaScript for Adding a Player to a Group -->
<script>
// For client-side player searching, we assume 'all_possible_players' is passed from your route as a JSON list.
var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players|tojson }};

// This function finds a player (case-insensitive) by part of their name.
function findPlayer(query) {
  query = query.toLowerCase();
  return allPossiblePlayers.filter(function(player) {
    var fullName = (player.first_name + " " + player.last_name).toLowerCase();
    var username = player.username.toLowerCase();
    return fullName.includes(query) || username.includes(query);
  });
}

document.querySelectorAll(".group-container").forEach(function(groupContainer){
  groupContainer.querySelector(".add-player-btn").addEventListener("click", function(){
    var searchInput = groupContainer.querySelector(".player-search");
    var query = searchInput.value.trim();
    if(!query){
      alert("Please enter a player name to search.");
      return;
    }
    var matches = findPlayer(query);
    if(matches.length === 0){
      alert("No matching player found.");
      return;
    }
    // For simplicity, if there is more than one match, pick the first one.
    var player = matches[0];
    // Create a new table row with the player's details.
    var newRow = document.createElement("tr");
    newRow.innerHTML = `
      <td>${player.first_name} ${player.last_name}</td>
      <td>${player.birth_year}</td>
      <td>0</td>
      <td>0</td>
      <td>0</td>
      <td>0%</td>
      <td>
        <!-- Placeholder for removal/freeze actions -->
        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
      </td>
    `;
    // Find the first row that has "Empty Slot" and replace its content.
    var tbody = groupContainer.querySelector(".group-table tbody");
    var emptyRow = tbody.querySelector("tr.group-slot");
    if(emptyRow){
      tbody.replaceChild(newRow, emptyRow);
    } else {
      alert("No empty slots available in this group.");
    }
    // Clear the search input
    searchInput.value = "";
  });
  
  // Optionally, allow dynamic removal of an assigned player.
  groupContainer.addEventListener("click", function(e){
    if(e.target && e.target.classList.contains("remove-assigned-btn")){
      // Replace the row with an "Empty Slot" row.
      var tr = e.target.closest("tr");
      var emptyRow = document.createElement("tr");
      emptyRow.classList.add("group-slot");
      emptyRow.innerHTML = `<td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>`;
      tr.parentNode.replaceChild(emptyRow, tr);
    }
  });
});
</script>
{% endblock %}

Explanation

  1. Admin Dashboard Route:
    Ensure your route passes all_possible_players (a list of users from your database) to the template as JSON. This allows the JavaScript function findPlayer() to search over them.

  2. Nested Competition Tabs:
    Each competition is now rendered in a nested tab (using <ul class="nav nav-tabs"> for the competition names and <div class="tab-content"> for each competition’s content).
    For each competition, we loop over the number of groups. In each group container:

    • A header displays the group name along with a search input and an "Add Player" button.

    • A table is rendered with a fixed number of rows (equal to the competition’s max_players). Each row is initially marked as an "Empty Slot."

  3. JavaScript:

    • When the "Add Player" button is clicked, the code reads the value in the search input, searches through allPossiblePlayers (using a simple case‑insensitive match), and if a match is found, it creates a new table row filled with that player’s details.

    • The code then replaces the first row that has the "Empty Slot" placeholder with the new row.

    • A "Remove" button is also provided in the new row so the admin can remove the assigned player and revert that slot back to "Empty Slot."

  4. Persistence:
    This implementation uses client‑side JavaScript to modify the competition group's tables. In a full production solution you would send an AJAX request or submit a form to save the player assignment in the database. For now, this code demonstrates the dynamic UI.

  5. Submission Behavior:
    The competition creation form (in the modal) posts to your /create-competition route, which persists the Competition record.

Save these changes to admin.html, ensure that your admin_dashboard route in app.py passes all the required variables (including all_possible_players), and then restart your Flask application. The new functionality should now create dynamic nested competition tabs where each group section includes a search box and button to add players.

Let me know if you need further adjustments or additional details!

You can now look at the traceback which led to the error. To switch between the interactive traceback and the plaintext one, you can click on the "Traceback" headline. From the text traceback you can also create a paste of it. For code execution mouse-over the frame you want to debug and click on the console icon on the right side. You can execute arbitrary Python code in the stack frames and there are some extra helpers available for introspection: dump() shows all variables in the frame dump(obj) dumps all that's known about the object Brought to you by DON'T PANIC, your friendly Werkzeug powered traceback interpreter.
ChatGPT said:
You said:
how do I install json throug terminal visual code
ChatGPT said:

The JSON module is built into Python's standard library, so you don’t need to install it separately. You can simply import it in your code using:

python
import json

If you're receiving a "not JSON serializable" error, it's because you're trying to convert a complex object (like a SQLAlchemy model instance) directly to JSON. To fix that, you should either build a dictionary with only the necessary fields or use a custom function to serialize your objects.

For example, instead of:

jinja
var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players|tojson }};

you might convert your list of users to a list of dictionaries in your route:

python
@app.route('/admin-dashboard')
@admin_required
def admin_dashboard():
    all_users = User.query.order_by(User.username).all()
    participants = User.query.filter_by(participant=True).order_by(User.username).all()
    competitions = Competition.query.order_by(Competition.id).all()
    # Convert all_possible_players (all_users in this case) to a serializable format:
    all_possible_players = [
        {
            "id": user.id,
            "first_name": user.first_name,
            "last_name": user.last_name,
            "username": user.username,
            "birth_year": user.birth_year
        }
        for user in all_users
    ]
    active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users')
    return render_template('admin.html', users=all_users, participants=participants,
                           competitions=competitions, active_tab=active_tab,
                           all_possible_players=all_possible_players)

Now in your template, you should be able to use:

html
<script>
  var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players | tojson }};
  // ... remaining JavaScript ...
</script>

This way, you’re converting each SQLAlchemy User object to a plain dictionary that is JSON serializable.

Let me know if you need any further assistance!

ChatGPT said:

please go through the code submited in this conversation
ChatGPT said:

Below is an updated version of your admin.html template. In the Create Competition tab, each group section now features a dropdown list (instead of a free‑text search box) populated with all possible players in the format FirstName_LastName. When the admin selects a player from the dropdown and clicks the Add Player button, a new row is added into that group's table showing the player's information.

Make sure that in your admin dashboard route (in app.py) you pass the list of possible players (for example, all users) in a variable named all_possible_players. (For JSON serialization, you should already be converting these user objects to a serializable dictionary in your route.)

You can copy and paste the code below into your templates/admin.html file:

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Outer Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='competition' %}show active{% endif %}" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <!-- Button to open competition creation modal -->
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <hr>
      <!-- Nested tabs for each competition; each competition gets its own nested tab -->
      {% if competitions %}
      <ul class="nav nav-tabs mt-3" id="compNav" role="tablist">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
          <button class="nav-link {% if loop.first %}active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#comp-{{ comp.id }}" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="comp-{{ comp.id }}" aria-selected="{% if loop.first %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
            {{ comp.name }}
          </button>
        </li>
        {% endfor %}
      </ul>
      <div class="tab-content mt-3" id="compNavContent">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <div class="tab-pane fade {% if loop.first %}show active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab">
          {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
          {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
          {% set groupName = "Group " ~ groupLetters[i] %}
          <div class="group-container mt-4" data-competition-id="{{ comp.id }}" data-group-index="{{ i }}">
            <!-- Dropdown list of players for this group -->
            <div class="d-flex align-items-center mb-2">
              <h5 class="mb-0 me-2">{{ groupName }}</h5>
              <select class="form-select player-dropdown" style="max-width: 300px;">
                <option value="">Select Player</option>
                {% for p in all_possible_players %}
                  <option value="{{ p.id }}">{{ p.first_name }}_{{ p.last_name }}</option>
                {% endfor %}
              </select>
              <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary ms-2 add-player-btn">Add Player</button>
            </div>
            <table class="table table-bordered group-table">
              <thead>
                <tr>
                  <th>Player Name</th>
                  <th>Year of Birth</th>
                  <th>Total Matches</th>
                  <th>Win</th>
                  <th>Loss</th>
                  <th>Win %</th>
                  <th>Actions</th>
                </tr>
              </thead>
              <tbody>
                {% for r in range(comp.max_players) %}
                <tr class="group-slot">
                  <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>
                </tr>
                {% endfor %}
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      {% else %}
      <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
      {% endif %}
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>

<script>
// Use the already passed 'all_possible_players', which is a list of dictionaries
var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players|tojson }};

// Function to find a player by its ID from allPossiblePlayers
function findPlayerById(id) {
  id = parseInt(id, 10);
  return allPossiblePlayers.find(function(player) {
    return player.id === id;
  });
}

// Attach event listeners for each group container (using the new dropdown)
document.querySelectorAll(".group-container").forEach(function(groupContainer) {
  groupContainer.querySelector(".add-player-btn").addEventListener("click", function() {
    var dropdown = groupContainer.querySelector(".player-dropdown");
    var playerId = dropdown.value;
    if (!playerId) {
      alert("Please select a player.");
      return;
    }
    var player = findPlayerById(playerId);
    if (!player) {
      alert("Player not found.");
      return;
    }
    // Create a new table row with the player's details.
    var newRow = document.createElement("tr");
    newRow.innerHTML = `
      <td>${player.first_name} ${player.last_name}</td>
      <td>${player.birth_year}</td>
      <td>0</td>
      <td>0</td>
      <td>0</td>
      <td>0%</td>
      <td>
        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
      </td>
    `;
    // Find the first available "Empty Slot" row.
    var tbody = groupContainer.querySelector(".group-table tbody");
    var emptyRow = tbody.querySelector("tr.group-slot");
    if (emptyRow) {
      tbody.replaceChild(newRow, emptyRow);
    } else {
      alert("No empty slots available in this group.");
    }
    // Optionally, reset the dropdown.
    dropdown.selectedIndex = 0;
  });
  
  // Allow removal of assigned players.
  groupContainer.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
    if (e.target && e.target.classList.contains("remove-assigned-btn")) {
      var tr = e.target.closest("tr");
      var emptyRow = document.createElement("tr");
      emptyRow.classList.add("group-slot");
      emptyRow.innerHTML = `<td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>`;
      tr.parentNode.replaceChild(emptyRow, tr);
    }
  });
});
</script>
{% endblock %}

Explanation

  • Dropdown Replacement:
    Instead of a text input and search icon, we now use a <select> element (with class player-dropdown) that is populated with options for each player (displayed as FirstName_LastName). The first option is a placeholder ("Select Player").

  • JavaScript Update:
    When the Add Player button is clicked, the script reads the selected value from the dropdown. It then searches for the player by ID from all_possible_players (which is passed to the template as a list of dictionaries) and creates a new row in the group table with that player's details.

  • Persistence (Client-side):
    This code dynamically updates the table on the client side. To persist these assignments in the database, you would eventually need to send the assignment information back to your server (via an AJAX call or a form submission). For now, these changes remain in the UI until the page is reloaded.

  • Event Handling:
    Each group container handles its own "Add Player" button click and removal of an assigned player using inline JavaScript.

Be sure that your admin dashboard route in app.py passes all_possible_players (converted to JSON-serializable dictionaries) along with your other variables. For example:

python
all_possible_players = [
    {"id": user.id, "first_name": user.first_name, "last_name": user.last_name, "username": user.username, "birth_year": user.birth_year}
    for user in User.query.order_by(User.username).all()
]

After updating your app.py and admin.html files with the code above, restart your Flask application and test that the dropdown list is populated correctly with FirstName_LastName for each player and that clicking the Add Player button adds a row to the group table accordingly.

Let me know if you need further adjustments!

Below is the complete updated admin.html template. In the Create Competition tab (in each group section), the dropdown is now populated with options in the format LastName, FirstName and is sorted alphabetically by last name. (Ensure that in your app.py you pass all_possible_players as a list of dictionaries of user details.) You can copy and paste this code:

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Outer Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='competition' %}show active{% endif %}" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <!-- Button to open competition creation modal -->
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <hr>
      <!-- Nested tabs: each competition gets its own tab -->
      {% if competitions %}
      <ul class="nav nav-tabs mt-3" id="compNav" role="tablist">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
          <button class="nav-link {% if loop.first %}active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#comp-{{ comp.id }}" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="comp-{{ comp.id }}" aria-selected="{% if loop.first %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
            {{ comp.name }}
          </button>
        </li>
        {% endfor %}
      </ul>
      <div class="tab-content mt-3" id="compNavContent">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <div class="tab-pane fade {% if loop.first %}show active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab">
          {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
          {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
          {% set groupName = "Group " ~ groupLetters[i] %}
          <div class="group-container mt-4" data-competition-id="{{ comp.id }}" data-group-index="{{ i }}">
            <!-- Dropdown list of players in format "LastName, FirstName", sorted alphabetically -->
            <div class="d-flex align-items-center mb-2">
              <h5 class="mb-0 me-2">{{ groupName }}</h5>
              <select class="form-select player-dropdown" style="max-width: 300px;">
                <option value="">Select Player</option>
                {% for p in all_possible_players|sort(attribute='last_name') %}
                  <option value="{{ p.id }}">{{ p.last_name }}, {{ p.first_name }}</option>
                {% endfor %}
              </select>
              <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary ms-2 add-player-btn">Add Player</button>
            </div>
            <table class="table table-bordered group-table">
              <thead>
                <tr>
                  <th>Player Name</th>
                  <th>Year of Birth</th>
                  <th>Total Matches</th>
                  <th>Win</th>
                  <th>Loss</th>
                  <th>Win %</th>
                  <th>Actions</th>
                </tr>
              </thead>
              <tbody>
                {% for r in range(comp.max_players) %}
                <tr class="group-slot">
                  <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>
                </tr>
                {% endfor %}
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      {% else %}
      <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
      {% endif %}
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Inline JavaScript for Adding a Player to a Group -->
<script>
// Convert passed 'all_possible_players' (already sorted in app.py or using Jinja sort) into a JavaScript array
var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players | tojson }};

// Attach event listeners for each group container (using the new dropdown)
document.querySelectorAll(".group-container").forEach(function(groupContainer) {
  groupContainer.querySelector(".add-player-btn").addEventListener("click", function() {
    var dropdown = groupContainer.querySelector(".player-dropdown");
    var playerId = dropdown.value;
    if (!playerId) {
      alert("Please select a player.");
      return;
    }
    // Find the player by id
    var player = allPossiblePlayers.find(function(p) {
      return parseInt(p.id) === parseInt(playerId);
    });
    if (!player) {
      alert("Player not found.");
      return;
    }
    // Create a new row with the player's details.
    var newRow = document.createElement("tr");
    newRow.innerHTML = `
      <td>${player.last_name}, ${player.first_name}</td>
      <td>${player.birth_year}</td>
      <td>0</td>
      <td>0</td>
      <td>0</td>
      <td>0%</td>
      <td>
        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
      </td>
    `;
    // Replace the first available "Empty Slot" row.
    var tbody = groupContainer.querySelector(".group-table tbody");
    var emptyRow = tbody.querySelector("tr.group-slot");
    if (emptyRow) {
      tbody.replaceChild(newRow, emptyRow);
    } else {
      alert("No empty slots available in this group.");
    }
    dropdown.selectedIndex = 0;
  });
  
  // Allow dynamic removal of assigned players.
  groupContainer.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
    if (e.target && e.target.classList.contains("remove-assigned-btn")) {
      var tr = e.target.closest("tr");
      var emptyRow = document.createElement("tr");
      emptyRow.classList.add("group-slot");
      emptyRow.innerHTML = `<td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>`;
      tr.parentNode.replaceChild(emptyRow, tr);
    }
  });
});
</script>
{% endblock %}

Additional Notes

  1. Sorting the Dropdown:
    The dropdown options are generated by iterating over all_possible_players|sort(attribute='last_name'). This uses Jinja's sort filter to sort by last name (you can further adjust the sort if needed in your route).

  2. Player Label Format:
    The option text is now formatted as {{ p.last_name }}, {{ p.first_name }}.

  3. Persistent Data:
    The competition data is now stored in the Competition model. (Remember that the dynamic assignment of players to groups is currently handled client‑side in this template. To persist these player assignments, additional server‑side functionality would be needed.)

  4. Route Adjustments:
    Make sure your app.py admin dashboard route passes all_possible_players as a JSON‑serializable list of dictionaries, for example:

    python
    all_possible_players = [
    {"id": user.id, "first_name": user.first_name, "last_name": user.last_name, "username": user.username, "birth_year": user.birth_year}
    for user in User.query.order_by(User.last_name, User.first_name).all()
]

Copy the code above into your admin.html file, update your routes accordingly, and restart your Flask application. This should meet your requirements for dropdown formatting and sorting. Let me know if you have any further questions or need additional adjustments!

You said:
where do I need to paste this exactly, instead of what
ChatGPT said:

You should use this code as your updated admin.html template. In other words, replace the contents of your existing admin.html file (located in your project's templates folder) with the new code. If you already have an admin.html, open that file in Visual Studio Code and paste the entire updated code over the old content. This updated template includes the changes you requested for the Create Competition tab and dropdown list functionality.

In summary:

  • Locate the file templates/admin.html in your project.

  • Open that file, delete its contents, and then copy/paste the new code provided in the previous message.

  • Save the file and restart your Flask application to see the changes.

Let me know if you need any more guidance!

You said:
Good, we still need to address the issue of losing the data in the tables when navigating away from create competition tab, this data needs to stay permanently there.
ChatGPT said:

Below is one integrated solution that adds persistence for player assignments in competition groups. In this solution we:

  1. Add a new model, CompetitionAssignment, to store each player's assignment to a given competition group.

  2. Provide a new endpoint (/assign-player) that accepts a POST (via AJAX) to record an assignment.

  3. Modify the admin dashboard route so that it loads existing assignments and passes them (as part of each competition’s data) to the template.

  4. Update the Create Competition tab in admin.html so that:

    • Each competition’s nested tab shows, for each group, its assigned players (persisted in the database) filling available rows up to max_players.

    • The player dropdown now displays each player as “LastName, FirstName” (sorted alphabetically by last name).

    • When a user is added via the dropdown and “Add Player” is clicked, JavaScript sends an AJAX (fetch API) POST request to /assign-player to save the assignment. If successful, the UI is updated.

Below you’ll find the full updated code for app.py and templates/admin.html. (Be sure to adjust any other routes as needed in your project.)

app.py

python
from flask import Flask, render_template, request, redirect, url_for, flash, session, jsonify
from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy
from functools import wraps
# Uncomment the following lines if using Flask-Migrate
# from flask_migrate import Migrate

app = Flask(__name__)
app.secret_key = 'your_secret_key_here'  # Change this for production

# Configure SQLAlchemy to use an SQLite database called users.db
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = 'sqlite:///users.db'
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False
db = SQLAlchemy(app)
# migrate = Migrate(app, db)  # Uncomment if using Flask-Migrate

# ----------------------
# Models
# ----------------------
class User(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    first_name = db.Column(db.String(80), nullable=False)
    last_name = db.Column(db.String(80), nullable=False)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True, nullable=False)
    password = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    email = db.Column(db.String(120), unique=True, nullable=False)
    phone = db.Column(db.String(20), nullable=False)
    birth_year = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False)
    handedness = db.Column(db.String(10), nullable=False)
    role = db.Column(db.String(20), nullable=False, default='user')
    participant = db.Column(db.Boolean, nullable=False, default=False)

    def __repr__(self):
        return f'<User {self.username}>'

class Competition(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    name = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    num_groups = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False)
    max_players = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False)

    def __repr__(self):
        return f'<Competition {self.name}>'

class CompetitionAssignment(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    competition_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('competition.id'), nullable=False)
    group_index = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False)  # 0-indexed
    user_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('user.id'), nullable=False)

    competition = db.relationship("Competition", backref=db.backref("assignments", lazy=True))
    user = db.relationship("User", backref=db.backref("assignments", lazy=True))

    def __repr__(self):
        return f'<Assignment Comp:{self.competition_id} Group:{self.group_index} User:{self.user_id}>'

# ----------------------
# Admin Decorator
# ----------------------
def admin_required(f):
    @wraps(f)
    def decorated_function(*args, **kwargs):
        if 'role' not in session or session['role'] != 'admin':
            flash('Access denied: Admins only', 'danger')
            return redirect(url_for('home'))
        return f(*args, **kwargs)
    return decorated_function

# ----------------------
# Routes (simplified versions for clarity)
# ----------------------
@app.route('/register', methods=['GET', 'POST'])
def register():
    if request.method == 'POST':
        # ... (handle registration)
        first_name = request.form['first_name']
        last_name = request.form['last_name']
        email = request.form['email']
        phone = request.form['phone']
        birth_year = request.form['birth_year']
        handedness = request.form['handedness']
        username = request.form['username']
        password = request.form['password']
        if User.query.filter_by(username=username).first():
            flash('Username already exists', 'danger')
        else:
            new_user = User(
                first_name=first_name,
                last_name=last_name,
                email=email,
                phone=phone,
                birth_year=birth_year,
                handedness=handedness,
                username=username,
                password=password
            )
            db.session.add(new_user)
            db.session.commit()
            flash('Registration successful! Please login.', 'success')
            return redirect(url_for('login'))
    return render_template('register.html')

@app.route('/login', methods=['GET', 'POST'])
def login():
    if request.method == 'POST':
        # ... (handle login)
        username = request.form['username']
        password = request.form['password']
        user = User.query.filter_by(username=username, password=password).first()
        if user:
            session['username'] = user.username
            session['email'] = user.email
            session['role'] = user.role
            flash('Login successful!', 'success')
            return redirect(url_for('home'))
        else:
            flash('Invalid username or password', 'danger')
    return render_template('login.html')

@app.route('/forgot-password', methods=['GET', 'POST'])
def forgot_password():
    # ... (handle forgot password)
    if request.method == 'POST':
        email = request.form['email']
        flash('If an account exists with that email, a password reset link has been sent.', 'info')
        return redirect(url_for('login'))
    return render_template('forgot_password.html')

@app.route('/')
def home():
    if 'username' in session:
        return render_template('landing_page.html')
    return redirect(url_for('login'))

@app.route('/profile')
def profile():
    if 'username' not in session:
        flash('Please login to view your profile', 'warning')
        return redirect(url_for('login'))
    user = User.query.filter_by(username=session['username']).first()
    if user:
        return render_template('profile_page.html', user=user)
    flash('User not found', 'danger')
    return redirect(url_for('login'))

@app.route('/profile/<username>')
def profile_by_username(username):
    user = User.query.filter_by(username=username).first()
    if user:
        return render_template('profile_page.html', user=user)
    flash('User not found', 'danger')
    return redirect(url_for('admin_dashboard'))

@app.route('/update-profile', methods=['POST'])
def update_profile():
    if 'username' not in session:
        flash('Please login to update your profile', 'warning')
        return redirect(url_for('login'))
    user = User.query.filter_by(username=session['username']).first()
    if user:
        # update user fields as necessary...
        user.first_name = request.form.get('first_name', user.first_name)
        user.last_name = request.form.get('last_name', user.last_name)
        user.email = request.form.get('email', user.email)
        user.phone = request.form.get('phone', user.phone)
        user.birth_year = request.form.get('birth_year', user.birth_year)
        user.handedness = request.form.get('handedness', user.handedness)
        db.session.commit()
        flash('Profile updated successfully!', 'success')
    else:
        flash('User not found.', 'danger')
    return redirect(url_for('profile'))

# ----------------------
# Participant Management Routes
# ----------------------
@app.route('/add-participant/<int:user_id>')
@admin_required
def add_participant(user_id):
    user = User.query.get(user_id)
    if user:
        user.participant = True
        db.session.commit()
        flash(f"{user.first_name} {user.last_name} has been added as a participant.", "success")
    else:
        flash("User not found.", "danger")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard"))

@app.route('/remove-participant/<int:user_id>')
@admin_required
def remove_participant(user_id):
    user = User.query.get(user_id)
    if user:
        if user.participant:
            user.participant = False
            db.session.commit()
            flash(f"{user.first_name} {user.last_name} has been removed from participants.", "success")
        else:
            flash("User is not a participant.", "warning")
    else:
        flash("User not found.", "danger")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard"))

@app.route('/freeze-participant/<int:user_id>')
@admin_required
def freeze_participant(user_id):
    flash("Freeze functionality is not implemented yet.", "info")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard"))

# ----------------------
# Competition Routes
# ----------------------
@app.route('/create-competition', methods=['POST'])
@admin_required
def create_competition():
    comp_name = request.form.get('compName').strip()
    num_groups = int(request.form.get('numGroups'))
    max_players = int(request.form.get('maxPlayers'))
    new_comp = Competition(name=comp_name, num_groups=num_groups, max_players=max_players)
    db.session.add(new_comp)
    db.session.commit()
    flash("Competition created successfully!", "success")
    return redirect(url_for("admin_dashboard", active_tab="competition"))

@app.route('/assign-player', methods=['POST'])
@admin_required
def assign_player():
    # Expect JSON containing competition_id, group_index, and user_id
    data = request.get_json(force=True)
    comp_id = data.get('competition_id')
    group_index = data.get('group_index')
    user_id = data.get('user_id')
    # Simple check: You might also check for duplicate assignment or group capacity here.
    assignment = CompetitionAssignment(competition_id=comp_id, group_index=group_index, user_id=user_id)
    db.session.add(assignment)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({"status": "success"}), 200

# ----------------------
# Admin Dashboard Route
# ----------------------
@app.route('/admin-dashboard')
@admin_required
def admin_dashboard():
    all_users = User.query.order_by(User.username).all()
    participants = User.query.filter_by(participant=True).order_by(User.username).all()
    competitions = Competition.query.order_by(Competition.id).all()
    # Load assignments and structure them as a dict: {competition_id: {group_index: [assignment, ...]}}
    assignments = CompetitionAssignment.query.all()
    assignments_dict = {}
    for a in assignments:
        assignments_dict.setdefault(a.competition_id, {}).setdefault(a.group_index, []).append(a)
    
    # Prepare all_possible_players as serializable dictionaries for the dropdown
    all_possible_players = [
        {"id": user.id, "first_name": user.first_name, "last_name": user.last_name, "username": user.username, "birth_year": user.birth_year}
        for user in User.query.order_by(User.last_name, User.first_name).all()
    ]
    
    active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users')
    return render_template('admin.html',
                           users=all_users,
                           participants=participants,
                           competitions=competitions,
                           assignments=assignments_dict,
                           active_tab=active_tab,
                           all_possible_players=all_possible_players)

@app.route('/logout', methods=['GET', 'POST'])
def logout():
    session.clear()
    flash('You have been logged out', 'info')
    return redirect(url_for('login'))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    with app.app_context():
        db.create_all()
    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5000, debug=True)

templates/admin.html

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Outer Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='competition' %}show active{% endif %}" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <!-- Button to open competition creation modal -->
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <hr>
      <!-- Nested tabs for competitions: each competition in its own tab -->
      {% if competitions %}
      <ul class="nav nav-tabs mt-3" id="compNav" role="tablist">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
          <button class="nav-link {% if loop.first %}active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#comp-{{ comp.id }}" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="comp-{{ comp.id }}" aria-selected="{% if loop.first %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
            {{ comp.name }}
          </button>
        </li>
        {% endfor %}
      </ul>
      <div class="tab-content mt-3" id="compNavContent">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <div class="tab-pane fade {% if loop.first %}show active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab">
          {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
          {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
          {% set groupName = "Group " ~ groupLetters[i] %}
          <div class="group-container mt-4" data-competition-id="{{ comp.id }}" data-group-index="{{ i }}">
            <!-- Dropdown list (sorted by last name) -->
            <div class="d-flex align-items-center mb-2">
              <h5 class="mb-0 me-2">{{ groupName }}</h5>
              <select class="form-select player-dropdown" style="max-width: 300px;">
                <option value="">Select Player</option>
                {% for p in all_possible_players|sort(attribute='last_name') %}
                  <option value="{{ p.id }}">{{ p.last_name }}, {{ p.first_name }}</option>
                {% endfor %}
              </select>
              <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary ms-2 add-player-btn">Add Player</button>
            </div>
            <table class="table table-bordered group-table">
              <thead>
                <tr>
                  <th>Player Name</th>
                  <th>Year of Birth</th>
                  <th>Total Matches</th>
                  <th>Win</th>
                  <th>Loss</th>
                  <th>Win %</th>
                  <th>Actions</th>
                </tr>
              </thead>
              <tbody>
                {# For each slot, if there is an assignment already, render it; otherwise show "Empty Slot" #}
                {% set assignments_for_group = assignments.get(comp.id, {}).get(i, []) %}
                {% for r in range(comp.max_players) %}
                  {% if r < assignments_for_group|length %}
                    {% set assign = assignments_for_group[r] %}
                    {% set assigned_player = (all_possible_players | selectattr("id", "equalto", assign.user_id) | list)[0] %}
                    <tr>
                      <td>{{ assigned_player.last_name }}, {{ assigned_player.first_name }}</td>
                      <td>{{ assigned_player.birth_year }}</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0%</td>
                      <td>
                        <!-- Placeholder removal action -->
                        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  {% else %}
                    <tr class="group-slot">
                      <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>
                    </tr>
                  {% endif %}
                {% endfor %}
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      {% else %}
      <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
      {% endif %}
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Inline JavaScript for Adding a Player to a Group -->
<script>
// all_possible_players is already passed as JSON (sorted in app.py if needed)
var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players|tojson }};

// Function to send assignment via AJAX to persist in the database.
function assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId) {
  return fetch("{{ url_for('assign_player') }}", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: {
      "Content-Type": "application/json"
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      competition_id: competitionId,
      group_index: groupIndex,
      user_id: playerId
    })
  }).then(response => response.json());
}

document.querySelectorAll(".group-container").forEach(function(groupContainer) {
  groupContainer.querySelector(".add-player-btn").addEventListener("click", function() {
    var dropdown = groupContainer.querySelector(".player-dropdown");
    var playerId = dropdown.value;
    if (!playerId) {
      alert("Please select a player.");
      return;
    }
    // Get competition id and group index from data attributes.
    var competitionId = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-competition-id");
    var groupIndex = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-group-index");
    // Find the player from allPossiblePlayers.
    var player = allPossiblePlayers.find(function(p) {
      return parseInt(p.id) === parseInt(playerId);
    });
    if (!player) {
      alert("Player not found.");
      return;
    }
    // Send AJAX request to persist assignment.
    assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId).then(function(data) {
      if (data.status === "success") {
        // On success, update UI: create new row.
        var newRow = document.createElement("tr");
        newRow.innerHTML = `
          <td>${player.last_name}, ${player.first_name}</td>
          <td>${player.birth_year}</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0%</td>
          <td>
            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
          </td>
        `;
        // Find first available "Empty Slot" row.
        var tbody = groupContainer.querySelector(".group-table tbody");
        var emptyRow = tbody.querySelector("tr.group-slot");
        if (emptyRow) {
          tbody.replaceChild(newRow, emptyRow);
        } else {
          alert("No empty slots available in this group.");
        }
        // Reset dropdown.
        dropdown.selectedIndex = 0;
      } else {
        alert("Failed to assign player.");
      }
    }).catch(function(err) {
      console.error(err);
      alert("Error occurred while assigning player.");
    });
  });
  
  // Allow removal of assigned players; optionally, also remove from database.
  groupContainer.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
    if (e.target && e.target.classList.contains("remove-assigned-btn")) {
      var tr = e.target.closest("tr");
      var emptyRow = document.createElement("tr");
      emptyRow.classList.add("group-slot");
      emptyRow.innerHTML = `<td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>`;
      tr.parentNode.replaceChild(emptyRow, tr);
      // For full persistence, you would also call an API endpoint to remove the assignment.
    }
  });
});
</script>
{% endblock %}

Additional Notes

  • Persisting Assignments:
    The /assign-player route in your app.py (see the earlier provided code) records the assignment in the database, so the data remains across page reloads.

  • Dropdown Sorting and Format:
    In the template, the <select> is populated with options sorted by last name (using Jinja’s sort filter) and displays values as “LastName, FirstName”.

  • Nested Competition Tabs:
    Each competition appears as its own tab, with group sections inside. The tables now create rows equal to the competition’s max_players. When an assignment is made via AJAX, a new row is created and replaces the first available "Empty Slot" row.

  • Removing Assignments:
    The remove button currently only updates the UI; you’d need to create an endpoint to delete an assignment from the database if full persistence is desired.

Make sure to update your database (e.g. run db.create_all() or use migrations) so that the new model CompetitionAssignment is in place. Then restart your Flask application and test the functionality.

Let me know if you need any further changes or clarifications!

You said:
Now make sure that a player is added in one group he is immediately removed from a list of players in the drop down of another group. There will never be a situation when one player will play in more than one group
ChatGPT said:

Below is the updated inline JavaScript portion from your admin.html template that ensures once a player is assigned to a group in a competition they’re removed from all dropdown lists for that same competition. In other words, if a player is added in one group, his option is removed immediately from the dropdowns in every group (in that competition), ensuring that a player can be assigned only once.

Find the existing JavaScript code in your template (the part that attaches event listeners to .group-container) and replace it with the following code:

html
<script>
// all_possible_players is already passed as JSON (sorted, etc.)
var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players|tojson }};

// Function to send assignment via AJAX to persist in the database.
function assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId) {
  return fetch("{{ url_for('assign_player') }}", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: {
      "Content-Type": "application/json"
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      competition_id: competitionId,
      group_index: groupIndex,
      user_id: playerId
    })
  }).then(response => response.json());
}

document.querySelectorAll(".group-container").forEach(function(groupContainer) {
  groupContainer.querySelector(".add-player-btn").addEventListener("click", function() {
    var dropdown = groupContainer.querySelector(".player-dropdown");
    var playerId = dropdown.value;
    if (!playerId) {
      alert("Please select a player.");
      return;
    }
    // Get competition id and group index from data attributes.
    var competitionId = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-competition-id");
    var groupIndex = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-group-index");
    // Find the player from allPossiblePlayers.
    var player = allPossiblePlayers.find(function(p) {
      return parseInt(p.id) === parseInt(playerId);
    });
    if (!player) {
      alert("Player not found.");
      return;
    }
    // Send AJAX request to persist the assignment.
    assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId).then(function(data) {
      if (data.status === "success") {
        // On success, update the UI: create a new row with player's details.
        var newRow = document.createElement("tr");
        newRow.innerHTML = `
          <td>${player.last_name}, ${player.first_name}</td>
          <td>${player.birth_year}</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0%</td>
          <td>
            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
          </td>
        `;
        // Find the first available "Empty Slot" row.
        var tbody = groupContainer.querySelector(".group-table tbody");
        var emptyRow = tbody.querySelector("tr.group-slot");
        if (emptyRow) {
          tbody.replaceChild(newRow, emptyRow);
        } else {
          alert("No empty slots available in this group.");
        }
        // Remove the assigned player's option from ALL dropdowns in this competition.
        var compDropdowns = document.querySelectorAll(`.group-container[data-competition-id="${competitionId}"] .player-dropdown`);
        compDropdowns.forEach(function(drop) {
          var opt = drop.querySelector(`option[value="${playerId}"]`);
          if (opt) {
            opt.remove();
          }
        });
        // Reset dropdown selection.
        dropdown.selectedIndex = 0;
      } else {
        alert("Failed to assign player.");
      }
    }).catch(function(err) {
      console.error(err);
      alert("Error occurred while assigning player.");
    });
  });
  
  // Allow dynamic removal of assigned players.
  groupContainer.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
    if (e.target && e.target.classList.contains("remove-assigned-btn")) {
      var tr = e.target.closest("tr");
      // Optionally, you could also call an API endpoint here to remove the assignment from the database.
      var emptyRow = document.createElement("tr");
      emptyRow.classList.add("group-slot");
      emptyRow.innerHTML = `<td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>`;
      tr.parentNode.replaceChild(emptyRow, tr);
    }
  });
});
</script>

Explanation

  • AJAX Assignment:
    When the Add Player button is clicked, an AJAX (fetch) request is sent to your /assign-player endpoint to persist the assignment in the database.

  • UI Update on Success:
    On successful assignment (i.e. when data.status is "success"):

    • A new table row is created and replaces the first row marked as an "Empty Slot".

    • All dropdowns for all group containers with the same data-competition-id are updated: the option with that player’s playerId is removed, ensuring the player is no longer selectable in any group.

    • The dropdown is reset.

  • Removal:
    The removal functionality remains available to revert an assignment (although for complete persistence you’d also add a backend endpoint for removal).

Make sure that your /assign-player route in app.py returns a JSON response like:

python
@app.route('/assign-player', methods=['POST'])
@admin_required
def assign_player():
    data = request.get_json(force=True)
    comp_id = data.get('competition_id')
    group_index = data.get('group_index')
    user_id = data.get('user_id')
    assignment = CompetitionAssignment(competition_id=comp_id, group_index=group_index, user_id=user_id)
    db.session.add(assignment)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({"status": "success"}), 200

Paste the updated JavaScript block into your admin.html template in place of your existing inline script for group assignment. This change will ensure that once a player is added in one group, they are removed from all dropdowns in that competition.

Let me know if you need further adjustments!

You said:

newRow.innerHTML = <td>${player.last_name}, ${player.first_name}</td> <td>${player.birth_year}</td> <td>0</td> <td>0</td> <td>0</td> <td>0%</td> <td> <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button> </td> ; // Optionally, you could also call an API endpoint here to remove the assignment from the database. var emptyRow = document.createElement("tr"); emptyRow.classList.add("group-slot"); emptyRow.innerHTML = <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>; tr.parentNode.replaceChild(emptyRow, tr); } }); }); </script>
ChatGPT said:

Below is the complete updated admin.html file that you can copy and paste. This file includes the nested competition tabs with group sections and the inline JavaScript for assigning players. The inline script (at the bottom) is exactly the code you provided, placed within the template so that it runs on page load.

Make sure you have already updated your admin dashboard route in app.py to pass the variable all_possible_players as a JSON‑serializable list of dictionaries (as well as users, participants, competitions, and assignments). Then, save this file in your project's templates folder as admin.html.

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Outer Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
