            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='competition' %}show active{% endif %}" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <!-- Button to open competition creation modal -->
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <hr>
      <!-- Nested tabs for competitions: each competition in its own tab -->
      {% if competitions %}
      <ul class="nav nav-tabs mt-3" id="compNav" role="tablist">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
          <button class="nav-link {% if loop.first %}active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#comp-{{ comp.id }}" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="comp-{{ comp.id }}" aria-selected="{% if loop.first %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
            {{ comp.name }}
          </button>
        </li>
        {% endfor %}
      </ul>
      <div class="tab-content mt-3" id="compNavContent">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <div class="tab-pane fade {% if loop.first %}show active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab">
          {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
          {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
          {% set groupName = "Group " ~ groupLetters[i] %}
          <div class="group-container mt-4" data-competition-id="{{ comp.id }}" data-group-index="{{ i }}">
            <!-- Dropdown list of players in the format "LastName, FirstName" (sorted by last name) -->
            <div class="d-flex align-items-center mb-2">
              <h5 class="mb-0 me-2">{{ groupName }}</h5>
              <select class="form-select player-dropdown" style="max-width: 300px;">
                <option value="">Select Player</option>
                {% for p in all_possible_players|sort(attribute='last_name') %}
                  <option value="{{ p.id }}">{{ p.last_name }}, {{ p.first_name }}</option>
                {% endfor %}
              </select>
              <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary ms-2 add-player-btn">Add Player</button>
            </div>
            <table class="table table-bordered group-table">
              <thead>
                <tr>
                  <th>Player Name</th>
                  <th>Year of Birth</th>
                  <th>Total Matches</th>
                  <th>Win</th>
                  <th>Loss</th>
                  <th>Win %</th>
                  <th>Actions</th>
                </tr>
              </thead>
              <tbody>
                {% set assignments_for_group = assignments.get(comp.id, {}).get(i, []) %}
                {% for r in range(comp.max_players) %}
                  {% if r < assignments_for_group|length %}
                    {% set assign = assignments_for_group[r] %}
                    {% set assigned_player = (all_possible_players | selectattr("id", "equalto", assign.user_id) | list)[0] %}
                    <tr>
                      <td>{{ assigned_player.last_name }}, {{ assigned_player.first_name }}</td>
                      <td>{{ assigned_player.birth_year }}</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0%</td>
                      <td>
                        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  {% else %}
                    <tr class="group-slot">
                      <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>
                    </tr>
                  {% endif %}
                {% endfor %}
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      {% else %}
      <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
      {% endif %}
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Inline JavaScript for Adding a Player to a Group -->
<script>
// all_possible_players is passed as JSON
var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players|tojson }};

// Function to send assignment via AJAX to persist in the database.
function assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId) {
  return fetch("{{ url_for('assign_player') }}", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: {
      "Content-Type": "application/json"
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      competition_id: competitionId,
      group_index: groupIndex,
      user_id: playerId
    })
  }).then(response => response.json());
}

// Attach event listeners for each group container.
document.querySelectorAll(".group-container").forEach(function(groupContainer) {
  groupContainer.querySelector(".add-player-btn").addEventListener("click", function() {
    var dropdown = groupContainer.querySelector(".player-dropdown");
    var playerId = dropdown.value;
    if (!playerId) {
      alert("Please select a player.");
      return;
    }
    // Get competition id and group index from data attributes.
    var competitionId = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-competition-id");
    var groupIndex = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-group-index");
    // Find the player from allPossiblePlayers.
    var player = allPossiblePlayers.find(function(p) {
      return parseInt(p.id) === parseInt(playerId);
    });
    if (!player) {
      alert("Player not found.");
      return;
    }
    // Send AJAX request to persist the assignment.
    assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId).then(function(data) {
      if (data.status === "success") {
        // On success, update the UI: create a new row with player's details.
        var newRow = document.createElement("tr");
        newRow.innerHTML = `
          <td>${player.last_name}, ${player.first_name}</td>
          <td>${player.birth_year}</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0%</td>
          <td>
            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
          </td>
        `;
        // Find the first available "Empty Slot" row.
        var tbody = groupContainer.querySelector(".group-table tbody");
        var emptyRow = tbody.querySelector("tr.group-slot");
        if (emptyRow) {
          tbody.replaceChild(newRow, emptyRow);
        } else {
          alert("No empty slots available in this group.");
        }
        // Remove the assigned player's option from all dropdowns in this competition.
        var compDropdowns = document.querySelectorAll(`.group-container[data-competition-id="${competitionId}"] .player-dropdown`);
        compDropdowns.forEach(function(drop) {
          var opt = drop.querySelector(`option[value="${playerId}"]`);
          if (opt) {
            opt.remove();
          }
        });
        // Reset dropdown selection.
        dropdown.selectedIndex = 0;
      } else {
        alert("Failed to assign player.");
      }
    }).catch(function(err) {
      console.error(err);
      alert("Error occurred while assigning player.");
    });
  });
  
  // Allow dynamic removal of assigned players.
  groupContainer.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
    if (e.target && e.target.classList.contains("remove-assigned-btn")) {
      var tr = e.target.closest("tr");
      var emptyRow = document.createElement("tr");
      emptyRow.classList.add("group-slot");
      emptyRow.innerHTML = `<td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>`;
      tr.parentNode.replaceChild(emptyRow, tr);
      // Optionally, you would also call an API endpoint to remove the assignment from the database.
    }
  });
});
</script>
{% endblock %}

Instructions

  1. Replace Your Existing admin.html:
    Open your templates/admin.html file in Visual Studio Code, delete its current contents, and then paste the entire code above.

  2. Ensure Your Backend Passes Required Variables:
    Your /admin-dashboard route in app.py must pass the following variables:

    • users (list of all users)

    • participants (list of users with participant=True)

    • competitions (list of Competition records)

    • assignments (dictionary of assignments in the format {competition_id: {group_index: [assignment, ...]}})

    • active_tab (e.g., "competition")

    • all_possible_players (list of dictionaries with keys "id", "first_name", "last_name", "username", "birth_year"; sorted appropriately)

  3. Restart Your Application:
    Make sure your application and database are up-to-date (run db.create_all() or apply migrations if necessary) and then restart your Flask app.

  4. Test the Functionality:
    In the Create Competition tab, verify that:

    • The dropdown lists players in the format LastName, FirstName (sorted by last name).

    • When a player is added to one group, the option is removed from all dropdowns in that competition.

    • The assignments are persisted via the /assign-player endpoint and the UI updates accordingly.

Let me know if you need further adjustments or additional help!

You said:
the code is not working. not only that the player is available to be added in more than one group, same player can be added more than one time in the same group
ChatGPT said:

Below is an updated solution that ensures a player cannot be assigned more than once per competition. In this solution, we add a server‑side check in the /assign-player route to verify that the selected player isn’t already assigned to any group in that competition. In addition, the inline JavaScript in your template will handle the failure response properly.

Updated app.py (Relevant Portion)

Find your /assign-player endpoint in your app.py and replace it with the following code:

python
@app.route('/assign-player', methods=['POST'])
@admin_required
def assign_player():
    data = request.get_json(force=True)
    comp_id = data.get('competition_id')
    group_index = data.get('group_index')
    user_id = data.get('user_id')
    # Check if this player is already assigned in this competition.
    existing_assignment = CompetitionAssignment.query.filter_by(competition_id=comp_id, user_id=user_id).first()
    if existing_assignment:
        return jsonify({"status": "failure", "message": "Player is already assigned to a group in this competition."}), 400
    assignment = CompetitionAssignment(competition_id=comp_id, group_index=group_index, user_id=user_id)
    db.session.add(assignment)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({"status": "success"}), 200

This change ensures that if a player is already assigned (i.e. there is an existing CompetitionAssignment for that competition and user), the endpoint returns a failure status and message.

Updated Inline JavaScript in admin.html

Replace the inline JavaScript section (which attaches event listeners to each group container) with this updated code. This version checks the response from the AJAX call and alerts if the assignment failed. It also removes the player's option from all dropdowns in the competition only upon a successful assignment.

html
<script>
// all_possible_players is passed as JSON from the backend.
var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players|tojson }};

// Function to send assignment via AJAX to persist in the database.
function assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId) {
  return fetch("{{ url_for('assign_player') }}", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: {
      "Content-Type": "application/json"
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      competition_id: competitionId,
      group_index: groupIndex,
      user_id: playerId
    })
  }).then(response => response.json());
}

document.querySelectorAll(".group-container").forEach(function(groupContainer) {
  groupContainer.querySelector(".add-player-btn").addEventListener("click", function() {
    var dropdown = groupContainer.querySelector(".player-dropdown");
    var playerId = dropdown.value;
    if (!playerId) {
      alert("Please select a player.");
      return;
    }
    // Get competition id and group index from data attributes.
    var competitionId = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-competition-id");
    var groupIndex = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-group-index");
    // Find the player from allPossiblePlayers.
    var player = allPossiblePlayers.find(function(p) {
      return parseInt(p.id) === parseInt(playerId);
    });
    if (!player) {
      alert("Player not found.");
      return;
    }
    // Send AJAX request to persist the assignment.
    assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId).then(function(data) {
      if (data.status === "success") {
        // On success, update the UI: create a new row with player's details.
        var newRow = document.createElement("tr");
        newRow.innerHTML = `
          <td>${player.last_name}, ${player.first_name}</td>
          <td>${player.birth_year}</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0%</td>
          <td>
            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
          </td>
        `;
        // Find the first available "Empty Slot" row.
        var tbody = groupContainer.querySelector(".group-table tbody");
        var emptyRow = tbody.querySelector("tr.group-slot");
        if (emptyRow) {
          tbody.replaceChild(newRow, emptyRow);
        } else {
          alert("No empty slots available in this group.");
        }
        // Remove the assigned player's option from all dropdowns in this competition.
        var compDropdowns = document.querySelectorAll(`.group-container[data-competition-id="${competitionId}"] .player-dropdown`);
        compDropdowns.forEach(function(drop) {
          var opt = drop.querySelector(`option[value="${playerId}"]`);
          if (opt) {
            opt.remove();
          }
        });
        // Reset dropdown selection.
        dropdown.selectedIndex = 0;
      } else {
        alert(data.message || "Failed to assign player.");
      }
    }).catch(function(err) {
      console.error(err);
      alert("Error occurred while assigning player.");
    });
  });
  
  // Allow dynamic removal of assigned players.
  groupContainer.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
    if (e.target && e.target.classList.contains("remove-assigned-btn")) {
      var tr = e.target.closest("tr");
      var emptyRow = document.createElement("tr");
      emptyRow.classList.add("group-slot");
      emptyRow.innerHTML = `<td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>`;
      tr.parentNode.replaceChild(emptyRow, tr);
      // OPTIONAL: Here, you could also call an endpoint to remove the assignment from the database.
      // If so, you might want to re-add the removed player's option back into the dropdowns.
    }
  });
});
</script>

Instructions

  1. Update your app.py:
    Replace your /assign-player endpoint with the updated version above to perform the duplicate check.

  2. Update your admin.html:
    In your admin.html template (in your templates folder), replace the inline JavaScript block (the one handling the group-player assignments) with the code above.

  3. Restart your Flask Application:
    Save all changes and restart your application so that the new code takes effect.

  4. Test the Assignment:
    In the Create Competition tab, for each group, select a player from the dropdown. Once a player is added:

    • They should be removed from all dropdowns for that competition.

    • If you try to add the same player again (even in a different group), the server will reject the assignment and alert "Player is already assigned to a group in this competition."

This should enforce that a player can only be assigned once per competition. Let me know if you have any further questions or need additional adjustments!

You said:
Good now just remove all plyers from the dropdown list which have already been assigned to previous group
ChatGPT said:

Below is the full updated admin.html file. In this version, for each competition, we pre‐compute a list of user IDs that have already been assigned to any group (using the passed-in assignments dictionary). Then, when rendering the dropdown for each group, we filter out any players whose IDs are in that list. This way, once a player is assigned in any group of that competition, they won’t appear in any dropdown for that competition.

Please copy and paste the following code into your templates/admin.html file:

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Outer Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='competition' %}show active{% endif %}" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <!-- Button to open competition creation modal -->
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <hr>
      <!-- Nested tabs for competitions: each competition in its own tab -->
      {% if competitions %}
      <ul class="nav nav-tabs mt-3" id="compNav" role="tablist">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
          <button class="nav-link {% if loop.first %}active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#comp-{{ comp.id }}" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="comp-{{ comp.id }}" aria-selected="{% if loop.first %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
            {{ comp.name }}
          </button>
        </li>
        {% endfor %}
      </ul>
      <div class="tab-content mt-3" id="compNavContent">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <div class="tab-pane fade {% if loop.first %}show active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab">
          {# Pre-calculate assigned IDs for this competition #}
          {% set assigned_ids = [] %}
          {% if assignments.get(comp.id) %}
            {% for group_assignments in assignments.get(comp.id).values() %}
              {% for assign in group_assignments %}
                {% if assign.user_id not in assigned_ids %}
                  {% set _ = assigned_ids.append(assign.user_id) %}
                {% endif %}
              {% endfor %}
            {% endfor %}
          {% endif %}
          
          {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
          {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
          {% set groupName = "Group " ~ groupLetters[i] %}
          <div class="group-container mt-4" data-competition-id="{{ comp.id }}" data-group-index="{{ i }}">
            <!-- Dropdown list of players (format "LastName, FirstName") for this competition,
                 excluding those already assigned (from any group) -->
            <div class="d-flex align-items-center mb-2">
              <h5 class="mb-0 me-2">{{ groupName }}</h5>
              <select class="form-select player-dropdown" style="max-width: 300px;">
                <option value="">Select Player</option>
                {% for p in all_possible_players|sort(attribute='last_name') if p.id not in assigned_ids %}
                  <option value="{{ p.id }}">{{ p.last_name }}, {{ p.first_name }}</option>
                {% endfor %}
              </select>
              <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary ms-2 add-player-btn">Add Player</button>
            </div>
            <table class="table table-bordered group-table">
              <thead>
                <tr>
                  <th>Player Name</th>
                  <th>Year of Birth</th>
                  <th>Total Matches</th>
                  <th>Win</th>
                  <th>Loss</th>
                  <th>Win %</th>
                  <th>Actions</th>
                </tr>
              </thead>
              <tbody>
                {% set assignments_for_group = assignments.get(comp.id, {}).get(i, []) %}
                {% for r in range(comp.max_players) %}
                  {% if r < assignments_for_group|length %}
                    {% set assign = assignments_for_group[r] %}
                    {% set assigned_player = (all_possible_players | selectattr("id", "equalto", assign.user_id) | list)[0] %}
                    <tr>
                      <td>{{ assigned_player.last_name }}, {{ assigned_player.first_name }}</td>
                      <td>{{ assigned_player.birth_year }}</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0%</td>
                      <td>
                        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  {% else %}
                    <tr class="group-slot">
                      <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>
                    </tr>
                  {% endif %}
                {% endfor %}
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      {% else %}
      <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
      {% endif %}
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Inline JavaScript for Adding a Player to a Group -->
<script>
// all_possible_players is passed as JSON from the backend.
var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players|tojson }};

// Function to send assignment via AJAX to persist in the database.
function assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId) {
  return fetch("{{ url_for('assign_player') }}", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: {
      "Content-Type": "application/json"
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      competition_id: competitionId,
      group_index: groupIndex,
      user_id: playerId
    })
  }).then(response => response.json());
}

document.querySelectorAll(".group-container").forEach(function(groupContainer) {
  groupContainer.querySelector(".add-player-btn").addEventListener("click", function() {
    var dropdown = groupContainer.querySelector(".player-dropdown");
    var playerId = dropdown.value;
    if (!playerId) {
      alert("Please select a player.");
      return;
    }
    var competitionId = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-competition-id");
    var groupIndex = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-group-index");
    var player = allPossiblePlayers.find(function(p) {
      return parseInt(p.id) === parseInt(playerId);
    });
    if (!player) {
      alert("Player not found.");
      return;
    }
    assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId).then(function(data) {
      if (data.status === "success") {
        var newRow = document.createElement("tr");
        newRow.innerHTML = `
          <td>${player.last_name}, ${player.first_name}</td>
          <td>${player.birth_year}</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0%</td>
          <td>
            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
          </td>
        `;
        var tbody = groupContainer.querySelector(".group-table tbody");
        var emptyRow = tbody.querySelector("tr.group-slot");
        if (emptyRow) {
          tbody.replaceChild(newRow, emptyRow);
        } else {
          alert("No empty slots available in this group.");
        }
        // Remove this player from all dropdowns in the competition.
        var compDropdowns = document.querySelectorAll(`.group-container[data-competition-id="${competitionId}"] .player-dropdown`);
        compDropdowns.forEach(function(drop) {
          var opt = drop.querySelector(`option[value="${playerId}"]`);
          if (opt) {
            opt.remove();
          }
        });
        dropdown.selectedIndex = 0;
      } else {
        alert(data.message || "Failed to assign player.");
      }
    }).catch(function(err) {
      console.error(err);
      alert("Error occurred while assigning player.");
    });
  });
  
  groupContainer.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
    if (e.target && e.target.classList.contains("remove-assigned-btn")) {
      var tr = e.target.closest("tr");
      var emptyRow = document.createElement("tr");
      emptyRow.classList.add("group-slot");
      emptyRow.innerHTML = `<td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>`;
      tr.parentNode.replaceChild(emptyRow, tr);
      // OPTIONAL: Call API endpoint to remove assignment and re-add player option.
    }
  });
});
</script>
{% endblock %}

Instructions

  1. Replace Your Existing admin.html File:
    Paste this code into your templates/admin.html file, replacing its previous contents.

  2. Backend Data:
    Ensure your /admin-dashboard route in app.py passes all_possible_players (a list of dictionaries for each user) and assignments (the dictionary of existing assignments) along with other variables.

  3. Restart Your Flask App:
    Save all changes and restart your application. Then test by creating competitions and assigning players. The dropdown for each group should now only list players that have not yet been assigned in any group of that competition.

This solution should meet your requirement that once a player is assigned in a competition, they are removed from the dropdown lists in all groups within that competition. Let me know if you have any further questions or need additional assistance!

You said:
not working. Same player cant be added to two different groups which is good but are still appearing in a dropdown of group B no matter that he has been added to group A.
ChatGPT said:

Below is the complete updated admin.html template. This version now uses an updated inline JavaScript snippet that iterates over each option (using querySelectorAll("option")) and compares IDs using parseInt(). That way, when a player is assigned in one group, his option is removed from all dropdowns (preventing the same player from being added more than once within the same competition).

You can replace your existing admin.html file (in your templates folder) with the code below:

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Outer Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='competition' %}show active{% endif %}" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <hr>
      <!-- Nested tabs for competitions: each competition in its own tab -->
      {% if competitions %}
      <ul class="nav nav-tabs mt-3" id="compNav" role="tablist">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
          <button class="nav-link {% if loop.first %}active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#comp-{{ comp.id }}" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="comp-{{ comp.id }}" aria-selected="{% if loop.first %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
            {{ comp.name }}
          </button>
        </li>
        {% endfor %}
      </ul>
      <div class="tab-content mt-3" id="compNavContent">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <div class="tab-pane fade {% if loop.first %}show active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab">
          {# Calculate assigned IDs for this competition across all groups #}
          {% set assigned_ids = [] %}
          {% if assignments.get(comp.id) %}
            {% for group_assignments in assignments.get(comp.id).values() %}
              {% for assign in group_assignments %}
                {% if assign.user_id not in assigned_ids %}
                  {% set _ = assigned_ids.append(assign.user_id) %}
                {% endif %}
              {% endfor %}
            {% endfor %}
          {% endif %}
          {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
          {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
          {% set groupName = "Group " ~ groupLetters[i] %}
          <div class="group-container mt-4" data-competition-id="{{ comp.id }}" data-group-index="{{ i }}">
            <!-- Dropdown list of players in "LastName, FirstName" format excluding already assigned ones -->
            <div class="d-flex align-items-center mb-2">
              <h5 class="mb-0 me-2">{{ groupName }}</h5>
              <select class="form-select player-dropdown" style="max-width: 300px;">
                <option value="">Select Player</option>
                {% for p in all_possible_players|sort(attribute='last_name') if p.id not in assigned_ids %}
                  <option value="{{ p.id }}">{{ p.last_name }}, {{ p.first_name }}</option>
                {% endfor %}
              </select>
              <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary ms-2 add-player-btn">Add Player</button>
            </div>
            <table class="table table-bordered group-table">
              <thead>
                <tr>
                  <th>Player Name</th>
                  <th>Year of Birth</th>
                  <th>Total Matches</th>
                  <th>Win</th>
                  <th>Loss</th>
                  <th>Win %</th>
                  <th>Actions</th>
                </tr>
              </thead>
              <tbody>
                {% set assignments_for_group = assignments.get(comp.id, {}).get(i, []) %}
                {% for r in range(comp.max_players) %}
                  {% if r < assignments_for_group|length %}
                    {% set assign = assignments_for_group[r] %}
                    {% set assigned_player = (all_possible_players | selectattr("id", "equalto", assign.user_id) | list)[0] %}
                    <tr>
                      <td>{{ assigned_player.last_name }}, {{ assigned_player.first_name }}</td>
                      <td>{{ assigned_player.birth_year }}</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0%</td>
                      <td>
                        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  {% else %}
                    <tr class="group-slot">
                      <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>
                    </tr>
                  {% endif %}
                {% endfor %}
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      {% else %}
      <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
      {% endif %}
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Inline JavaScript for Adding a Player to a Group -->
<script>
// all_possible_players is passed as JSON from the backend.
var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players|tojson }};

// Function to send assignment via AJAX to persist in the database.
function assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId) {
  return fetch("{{ url_for('assign_player') }}", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: {
      "Content-Type": "application/json"
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      competition_id: competitionId,
      group_index: groupIndex,
      user_id: playerId
    })
  }).then(response => response.json());
}

document.querySelectorAll(".group-container").forEach(function(groupContainer) {
  groupContainer.querySelector(".add-player-btn").addEventListener("click", function() {
    var dropdown = groupContainer.querySelector(".player-dropdown");
    var playerId = dropdown.value;
    if (!playerId) {
      alert("Please select a player.");
      return;
    }
    var competitionId = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-competition-id");
    var groupIndex = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-group-index");
    var player = allPossiblePlayers.find(function(p) {
      return parseInt(p.id) === parseInt(playerId);
    });
    if (!player) {
      alert("Player not found.");
      return;
    }
    assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId).then(function(data) {
      if (data.status === "success") {
        var newRow = document.createElement("tr");
        newRow.innerHTML = `
          <td>${player.last_name}, ${player.first_name}</td>
          <td>${player.birth_year}</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0%</td>
          <td>
            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
          </td>
        `;
        var tbody = groupContainer.querySelector(".group-table tbody");
        var emptyRow = tbody.querySelector("tr.group-slot");
        if (emptyRow) {
          tbody.replaceChild(newRow, emptyRow);
        } else {
          alert("No empty slots available in this group.");
        }
        // Remove the assigned player's option from all dropdowns in this competition.
        var compDropdowns = document.querySelectorAll(`.group-container[data-competition-id="${competitionId}"] .player-dropdown`);
        compDropdowns.forEach(function(drop) {
          drop.querySelectorAll("option").forEach(function(opt) {
            if (parseInt(opt.value) === parseInt(playerId)) {
              opt.remove();
            }
          });
        });
        dropdown.selectedIndex = 0;
      } else {
        alert(data.message || "Failed to assign player.");
      }
    }).catch(function(err) {
      console.error(err);
      alert("Error occurred while assigning player.");
    });
  });
  
  groupContainer.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
    if (e.target && e.target.classList.contains("remove-assigned-btn")) {
      var tr = e.target.closest("tr");
      var emptyRow = document.createElement("tr");
      emptyRow.classList.add("group-slot");
      emptyRow.innerHTML = `<td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>`;
      tr.parentNode.replaceChild(emptyRow, tr);
      // OPTIONAL: Call API endpoint to remove assignment from the database.
    }
  });
});
</script>
{% endblock %}

Instructions

  1. Paste this Code into your templates/admin.html file (replacing the previous version).

  2. Backend Requirements:
    Make sure your /admin-dashboard route in app.py passes the required variables:

    • users

    • participants

    • competitions

    • assignments (a dictionary mapping each competition’s ID to group assignments)

    • all_possible_players (a list of dictionaries with keys "id", "first_name", "last_name", "username", "birth_year"), sorted as needed.

  3. Restart the Application:
    Save changes and restart your Flask app.

  4. Test:
    Create a competition and assign players to groups. Each player assigned in one group will be removed from the dropdown lists in all groups for that competition.

This updated template should now ensure that any player already assigned in any group is not available in the dropdown of any other group for that competition. Let me know if you have any further questions or need more modifications!

You said:
great, now modify the Remove method so it removes the player entirely. Now, it is removing it but if I move to another page and come back to create competition all previously removed players will be there
ChatGPT said:

Below is the complete updated admin.html file that now includes a removal method which fully removes a player assignment from the database. When you click Remove on an assigned player row, an AJAX call is made to a new endpoint ("/remove-assignment") that deletes the assignment record. On successful removal, the UI is updated by removing the row and re‑adding the player’s option back into all dropdowns for that competition. This ensures that once removed, the player becomes selectable again (and cannot appear twice across groups).

Before using this template, be sure that your app.py file includes a new route for /remove-assignment as shown later in this answer and that your /admin-dashboard route passes the variables:

  • users

  • participants

  • competitions

  • assignments (a dictionary mapping competition IDs → group index → list of assignment records)

  • all_possible_players (a list of dictionaries with keys "id", "first_name", "last_name", "username", "birth_year" sorted appropriately)

  • active_tab

Then, paste the following code into your templates/admin.html file (replacing its previous content):

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Outer Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Create Competition Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='competition' %}show active{% endif %}" id="competition" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="competition-tab">
      <div class="mt-3">
        <p>Total number of players: <strong>{{ participants|length }}</strong></p>
        <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#competitionModal">Create Competition</button>
      </div>
      <hr>
      <!-- Nested tabs for competitions: each competition in its own tab -->
      {% if competitions %}
      <ul class="nav nav-tabs mt-3" id="compNav" role="tablist">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
          <button class="nav-link {% if loop.first %}active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#comp-{{ comp.id }}" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="comp-{{ comp.id }}" aria-selected="{% if loop.first %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
            {{ comp.name }}
          </button>
        </li>
        {% endfor %}
      </ul>
      <div class="tab-content mt-3" id="compNavContent">
        {% for comp in competitions %}
        <div class="tab-pane fade {% if loop.first %}show active{% endif %}" id="comp-{{ comp.id }}" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="comp-{{ comp.id }}-tab">
          {# Calculate assigned IDs for this competition across all groups #}
          {% set assigned_ids = [] %}
          {% if assignments.get(comp.id) %}
            {% for group_assignments in assignments.get(comp.id).values() %}
              {% for assign in group_assignments %}
                {% if assign.user_id not in assigned_ids %}
                  {% set _ = assigned_ids.append(assign.user_id) %}
                {% endif %}
              {% endfor %}
            {% endfor %}
          {% endif %}
          {% set groupLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" %}
          {% for i in range(comp.num_groups) %}
          {% set groupName = "Group " ~ groupLetters[i] %}
          <div class="group-container mt-4" data-competition-id="{{ comp.id }}" data-group-index="{{ i }}">
            <!-- Dropdown list of players (format "LastName, FirstName") for this competition,
                 excluding those already assigned (across all groups) -->
            <div class="d-flex align-items-center mb-2">
              <h5 class="mb-0 me-2">{{ groupName }}</h5>
              <select class="form-select player-dropdown" style="max-width: 300px;">
                <option value="">Select Player</option>
                {% for p in all_possible_players|sort(attribute='last_name') if p.id not in assigned_ids %}
                  <option value="{{ p.id }}">{{ p.last_name }}, {{ p.first_name }}</option>
                {% endfor %}
              </select>
              <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary ms-2 add-player-btn">Add Player</button>
            </div>
            <table class="table table-bordered group-table">
              <thead>
                <tr>
                  <th>Player Name</th>
                  <th>Year of Birth</th>
                  <th>Total Matches</th>
                  <th>Win</th>
                  <th>Loss</th>
                  <th>Win %</th>
                  <th>Actions</th>
                </tr>
              </thead>
              <tbody>
                {% set assignments_for_group = assignments.get(comp.id, {}).get(i, []) %}
                {% for r in range(comp.max_players) %}
                  {% if r < assignments_for_group|length %}
                    {% set assign = assignments_for_group[r] %}
                    {% set assigned_player = (all_possible_players | selectattr("id", "equalto", assign.user_id) | list)[0] %}
                    <tr data-player-id="{{ assigned_player.id }}">
                      <td>{{ assigned_player.last_name }}, {{ assigned_player.first_name }}</td>
                      <td>{{ assigned_player.birth_year }}</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0</td>
                      <td>0%</td>
                      <td>
                        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  {% else %}
                    <tr class="group-slot">
                      <td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>
                    </tr>
                  {% endif %}
                {% endfor %}
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      {% else %}
      <p>No competitions created yet.</p>
      {% endif %}
      
      <!-- Bootstrap Modal for Competition Creation Form -->
      <div class="modal fade" id="competitionModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="competitionModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
          <div class="modal-content">
            <form action="{{ url_for('create_competition') }}" method="POST" id="competitionForm">
              <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title" id="competitionModalLabel">Create Competition</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="compName" class="form-label">Competition Name</label>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="compName" name="compName" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="numGroups" class="form-label">Number of Groups</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="numGroups" name="numGroups" min="1" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                  <label for="maxPlayers" class="form-label">Maximum Number of Players in One Group</label>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="maxPlayers" name="maxPlayers" min="1" required>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Competition</button>
              </div>
            </form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div> <!-- End Create Competition Tab -->
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Inline JavaScript for Player Assignment and Removal -->
<script>
// all_possible_players is passed as JSON from the backend.
var allPossiblePlayers = {{ all_possible_players|tojson }};

// Function to send assignment via AJAX to persist in the database.
function assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId) {
  return fetch("{{ url_for('assign_player') }}", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: {
      "Content-Type": "application/json"
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      competition_id: competitionId,
      group_index: groupIndex,
      user_id: playerId
    })
  }).then(response => response.json());
}

// Function to remove assignment via AJAX.
function removeAssignment(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId) {
  return fetch("{{ url_for('remove_assignment') }}", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: {
      "Content-Type": "application/json"
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      competition_id: competitionId,
      group_index: groupIndex,
      user_id: playerId
    })
  }).then(response => response.json());
}

// Attach event listeners for each group container.
document.querySelectorAll(".group-container").forEach(function(groupContainer) {
  groupContainer.querySelector(".add-player-btn").addEventListener("click", function() {
    var dropdown = groupContainer.querySelector(".player-dropdown");
    var playerId = dropdown.value;
    if (!playerId) {
      alert("Please select a player.");
      return;
    }
    var competitionId = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-competition-id");
    var groupIndex = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-group-index");
    var player = allPossiblePlayers.find(function(p) {
      return parseInt(p.id) === parseInt(playerId);
    });
    if (!player) {
      alert("Player not found.");
      return;
    }
    assignPlayerToGroup(competitionId, groupIndex, playerId).then(function(data) {
      if (data.status === "success") {
        // Create new row with data-player-id attribute for future reference.
        var newRow = document.createElement("tr");
        newRow.setAttribute("data-player-id", playerId);
        newRow.innerHTML = `
          <td>${player.last_name}, ${player.first_name}</td>
          <td>${player.birth_year}</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0</td>
          <td>0%</td>
          <td>
            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-warning remove-assigned-btn">Remove</button>
          </td>
        `;
        var tbody = groupContainer.querySelector(".group-table tbody");
        var emptyRow = tbody.querySelector("tr.group-slot");
        if (emptyRow) {
          tbody.replaceChild(newRow, emptyRow);
        } else {
          alert("No empty slots available in this group.");
        }
        // Remove this player's option from all dropdowns in this competition.
        var compDropdowns = document.querySelectorAll(`.group-container[data-competition-id="${competitionId}"] .player-dropdown`);
        compDropdowns.forEach(function(drop) {
          drop.querySelectorAll("option").forEach(function(opt) {
            if (parseInt(opt.value) === parseInt(playerId)) {
              opt.remove();
            }
          });
        });
        dropdown.selectedIndex = 0;
      } else {
        alert(data.message || "Failed to assign player.");
      }
    }).catch(function(err) {
      console.error(err);
      alert("Error occurred while assigning player.");
    });
  });
  
  // Attach event listener for removal of assigned players.
  groupContainer.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
    if (e.target && e.target.classList.contains("remove-assigned-btn")) {
      var tr = e.target.closest("tr");
      var removedPlayerId = tr.getAttribute("data-player-id");
      var competitionId = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-competition-id");
      var groupIndex = groupContainer.getAttribute("data-group-index");
      // Send AJAX request to remove assignment.
      removeAssignment(competitionId, groupIndex, removedPlayerId).then(function(data) {
        if (data.status === "success") {
          var emptyRow = document.createElement("tr");
          emptyRow.classList.add("group-slot");
          emptyRow.innerHTML = `<td colspan="7" class="text-center">Empty Slot</td>`;
          tr.parentNode.replaceChild(emptyRow, tr);
          // Re-add the removed player's option to all dropdowns in this competition.
          var compDropdowns = document.querySelectorAll(`.group-container[data-competition-id="${competitionId}"] .player-dropdown`);
          compDropdowns.forEach(function(drop) {
            // Check if the option already exists.
            var exists = Array.from(drop.options).some(function(opt) {
              return parseInt(opt.value) === parseInt(removedPlayerId);
            });
            if (!exists) {
              var removedPlayer = allPossiblePlayers.find(function(p) {
                return parseInt(p.id) === parseInt(removedPlayerId);
              });
              if (removedPlayer) {
                var newOption = document.createElement("option");
                newOption.value = removedPlayer.id;
                newOption.text = removedPlayer.last_name + ", " + removedPlayer.first_name;
                drop.appendChild(newOption);
              }
            }
          });
        } else {
          alert(data.message || "Failed to remove assigned player.");
        }
      }).catch(function(err) {
        console.error(err);
        alert("Error occurred while removing assigned player.");
      });
    }
  });
});
</script>
{% endblock %}

Additional Backend Code

Make sure your app.py file includes the following new endpoint to remove an assignment from the database:

python
@app.route('/remove-assignment', methods=['POST'])
@admin_required
def remove_assignment():
    data = request.get_json(force=True)
    comp_id = data.get('competition_id')
    group_index = data.get('group_index')
    user_id = data.get('user_id')
    assignment = CompetitionAssignment.query.filter_by(competition_id=comp_id, group_index=group_index, user_id=user_id).first()
    if assignment:
        db.session.delete(assignment)
        db.session.commit()
        return jsonify({"status": "success"}), 200
    else:
        return jsonify({"status": "failure", "message": "Assignment not found"}), 400

Instructions Recap

  1. Update your admin.html:
    Replace its current content with the code above.

  2. Ensure Your Backend (app.py) Has:

    • The /assign-player endpoint (with duplicate checks, as provided earlier).

    • The new /remove-assignment endpoint.

    • The /admin-dashboard route is passing all necessary variables: users, participants, competitions, assignments, all_possible_players, and active_tab.

  3. Restart your Flask Application:
    Save all changes and restart your Flask server.

  4. Test the Functionality:
    Create a competition, assign players to groups, and then try removing an assigned player. The removed player should be re‑added to all dropdowns (and not be assigned in more than one group).

This update should enforce that a player is only assigned once per competition and that when removed, they are removed from the database so that the removal is persistent. Let me know if you need further adjustments!

You said:
Now, for each created championship there should be a button Delete Competition. When clicked it should delete the entire tab but first there should be alarming pop up asking admin is he sure he wants to delete the competition and that by doing so all data will be deleted
ChatGPT said:

Below is an updated version of your project that adds a "Delete Competition" feature. In this solution:

  1. A new endpoint /delete-competition/<int:comp_id> is added to app.py which deletes the specified competition along with all its assignment records.

  2. In admin.html, each competition’s tab now displays a "Delete Competition" button. When clicked, a confirm dialog appears; if the admin confirms, an AJAX POST request is sent to the backend to delete the competition. On success, the corresponding tab is removed from the UI.

You can copy and paste the code changes below into your project.

Updated app.py

Add this new endpoint (ensure it is placed along with your other competition-related routes):

python
@app.route('/delete-competition/<int:comp_id>', methods=['POST'])
@admin_required
def delete_competition(comp_id):
    comp = Competition.query.get(comp_id)
    if not comp:
        return jsonify({"status": "failure", "message": "Competition not found."}), 404
    # Delete all related assignment records first
    CompetitionAssignment.query.filter_by(competition_id=comp_id).delete()
    db.session.delete(comp)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({"status": "success"}), 200

Ensure that you have imported jsonify from Flask. (The rest of app.py remains the same as in your previous version.)

Updated admin.html

Replace your existing templates/admin.html file with the code below. (This version now includes, inside each competition’s nested tab, a "Delete Competition" button at the top; it also includes inline JavaScript to handle deletion.)

html
{% extends "base.html" %}
{% block title %}Admin Dashboard{% endblock %}
{% block content %}
{% set active_tab = request.args.get('active_tab', 'users') %}
<div class="container mt-5 position-relative">
  <!-- Back to Landing Page Button (top right) -->
  <div class="position-absolute" style="top: 0; right: 0;">
    <a href="{{ url_for('home') }}" class="btn btn-secondary">Back to Landing Page</a>
  </div>
  
  <h2 class="mt-3">Admin Dashboard</h2>
  
  <!-- Primary Outer Tabs: Users, Players, Create Competition -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="adminTab" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='users' %}active{% endif %}" id="users-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#users" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="users" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='users' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Users
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='players' %}active{% endif %}" id="players-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#players" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="players" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='players' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Players
      </button>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
      <button class="nav-link {% if active_tab=='competition' %}active{% endif %}" id="competition-tab" data-bs-toggle="tab" data-bs-target="#competition" type="button" role="tab" aria-controls="competition" aria-selected="{% if active_tab=='competition' %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}">
        Create Competition
      </button>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <div class="tab-content" id="adminTabContent">
    <!-- Users Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='users' %}show active{% endif %}" id="users" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="users-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Username</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for user in users %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=user.username) }}">
                  {{ user.username }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ user.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                {% if not user.participant %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('add_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-success btn-sm">Add Player</a>
                {% else %}
                  <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                {% endif %}
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=user.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Players Tab -->
    <div class="tab-pane fade {% if active_tab=='players' %}show active{% endif %}" id="players" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="players-tab">
      <div class="table-responsive mt-3">
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
          <thead>
            <tr>
              <th>Player Name</th>
              <th>Year of Birth</th>
              <th>Total Matches</th>
              <th>Win</th>
              <th>Loss</th>
              <th>Win %</th>
              <th>Actions</th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
            {% for participant in participants %}
            <tr>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('profile_by_username', username=participant.username) }}">
                  {{ participant.first_name }} {{ participant.last_name }}
                </a>
              </td>
              <td>{{ participant.birth_year }}</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0</td>
              <td>0%</td>
              <td>
                <a href="{{ url_for('remove_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Remove Player</a>
                <a href="{{ url_for('freeze_participant', user_id=participant.id) }}" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Freeze Player</a>
              </td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            <tr>
              <td colspan="7" class="text-center">No participants added yet.</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
